All rights reserved.</p> </footer> </body> </html> create this web page as so attractive and add some animation

To make your portfolio page more attractive and add some animations, you can enhance the design with various CSS animations and transitions. Below is an updated version of your HTML and CSS with improved styling and animations:

Updated HTML

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Portfolio - Chandru V</title>
    <style>
        /* CSS Reset */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        body {
            font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            background: url('Portfolio.jpg') no-repeat center center fixed;
            background-size: cover;
            color: #333;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
        }
        header {
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            padding: 20px 0;
            text-align: center;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        header img {
            width: 200px;
            height: 200px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            object-fit: cover;
            position: absolute;
            top: 20px;
            right: 20px;
            border: 4px solid #fff;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
            animation: zoomIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        nav {
            background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8);
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: 10px 0;
            width: 100%;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }
        nav a {
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 14px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
            border-radius: 4px;
        }
        nav a:hover {
            background: rgba(85, 85, 85, 0.8);
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        h1 {
            font-size: 2.5em;
            margin: 0;
            animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out;
        }
        h2 {
            font-size: 1.8em;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            color: #333;
            animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out;
        }
        p {
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        .container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 20px;
            padding: 20px;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 1200px;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        @media (min-width: 1024px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        .about-me, .skills, .projects, .certificates, .contact {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid #ccc;
            animation: fadeInUp 1s ease-out;
        }
        ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        li:hover {
            background: #d0d0d0;
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        .project {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .certificates ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        .certificates li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li:hover {
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        footer {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px 0;
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            width: 100%;
        }
        .social-icons {
            margin-top: 10px;
        }
        .social-icons a {
            margin: 0 10px;
            display: inline-block;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .social-icons a:hover {
            transform: scale(1.2);
        }
        .social-icons img {
            width: 30px;
            height: 30px;
            object-fit: cover;
        }

        /* Animations */
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
        @keyframes fadeInUp {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes slideInDown {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(-20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes zoomIn {
            from {
                transform: scale(0.8);
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                transform: scale(1);
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <header>
        <h1>Chandru V</h1>
        <img src="IMG_20240513_202325.jpg" alt="Chandru V">
        <p>Portfolio</p>
    </header>
    
    <nav>
        <a href="#about-me">About</a>
        <a href="#skills">Skills</a>
        <a href="#projects">Projects</a>
        <a href="#certificates">Certificates</a>
        <a href="#contact">Contact</a>
    </nav>

    <div class="container">
        <section id="about-me" class="about-me">
            <h2>About Me</h2>
            <p>I am Chandru, a passionate web developer and UI/UX designer based in Coimbatore, India. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I create responsive and user-friendly websites. I am also experienced in C++, Java, and React.js.</p>
        </section>

        <section id="skills" class="skills">
            <h2>Skills</h2>
            <ul>
                <li>HTML5</li>
                <li>CSS3</li>
                <li>JavaScript</li>
                <li>C++</li>
                <li>React.js</li>
            </ul>
        </section>

        <section id="projects" class="projects">
            <h2>Projects</h2>

            <div class="project">
                <h3>Virtual Animal</h3>
                <p>A project that allows users to adopt virtual pets, providing a fun and engaging way to learn about animal care.</p>
                <p><a href="file:///C:/Users/Admin/OneDrive/Desktop/VIRTUAL%20ANIMAL/adoption.html" target="_blank">View Project</a></p>
            </div>

            <!-- Add more projects as needed -->
        </section>

        <section id="certificates" class="certificates">
            <h2>Certificates</h2>
            <ul>
                <li>
                    <h3>Matlab Onramp</h3>
                    <img src="MatLab.png" alt="Certificate 1">
                </li>
                <li>
                    <h3>Codsoft</h3>
                    <img src="Codsoft.png" alt="Certificate 2">
                </li>
                <!-- Add more certificates as needed -->
            </ul>
        </section>

        <section id="contact" class="contact">
            <h2>Contact</h2>
            <p>Email: <a href="mailto:chandruv089@gmail.com">chandruv089@gmail.com</a></p>
            <p>Phone: <a href="tel:+917305951073">+91-7305951073</a></p>
            <p>Address: Coimbatore, India</p>
            <div class="social-icons">
                <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/chandru-venkatesan-976848258/" target="_blank">
                    <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/174/174857.png" alt="LinkedIn">
                </a>
                <a href="https://github.com/your-github-username" target="_blank">
                    <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/733/733609.png" alt="GitHub">
                </a>
            </div>
        </section>
    </div>

    <footer>
        <p>&copy; 2024 Chandru V. All rights reserved.</p>
    </footer>
</body>
</html>

Key Enhancements:

  1. Header Image: Increased the size and added a border and shadow to make it stand out more. Added zoom-in animation for a dynamic effect.

  2. Navigation Links: Added hover effects including scaling for a more interactive feel.

  3. Text Animations: Applied fade-in and slide-in animations to headers and sections to give a smoother entrance effect.

  4. List Items and Projects: Added hover effects to list items and project images to make them more engaging.

  5. Social Icons: Added scaling effect on hover for social icons.

Feel free to adjust the values and timings of the animations to better fit your style and preferences.

<!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Portfolio - Chandru V</title> <style> /* CSS Reset */ * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; } body { font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0; padding: 0; background: url('Background Portfolio.avif') no-repeat center center fixed; background-size: cover; color: #333; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; } header { background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8); color: #fff; padding: 20px 0; text-align: center; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); width: 100%; position: relative; animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out; } header img { width: 200px; height: 200px; border-radius: 50%; object-fit: cover; position: absolute; top: 20px; right: 20px; border: 4px solid #fff; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); animation: zoomIn 2s ease-out; } nav { background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; padding: 10px 0; width: 100%; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } nav a { color: #fff; text-align: center; padding: 14px 20px; text-decoration: none; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; border-radius: 4px; } nav a:hover { background: rgba(85, 85, 85, 0.8); transform: scale(1.1); } h1 { font-size: 2.5em; margin: 0; animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out; } h2 { font-size: 1.8em; margin-bottom: 10px; color: #333; animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out; } p { margin-bottom: 10px; } .container { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 20px; padding: 20px; width: 100%; max-width: 1200px; box-sizing: border-box; animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out; } @media (min-width: 768px) { .container { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; } } @media (min-width: 1024px) { .container { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr; } } .about-me, .skills, .projects, .certificates, .contact { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9); padding: 20px; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); border: 1px solid #ccc; animation: fadeInUp 1s ease-out; } ul { list-style-type: none; padding: 0; } li { background: #e7e7e7; margin: 5px 0; padding: 10px; border-radius: 4px; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; } li:hover { background: #d0d0d0; transform: scale(1.02); } .project { margin-bottom: 20px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .project img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 8px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .project a { display: inline-block; background: #333; color: #fff; padding: 10px 20px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 4px; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; } .project a:hover { background: #555; transform: scale(1.1); } .certificates ul { list-style-type: none; padding: 0; } .certificates li { background: #e7e7e7; margin: 5px 0; padding: 10px; border-radius: 4px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; transition: transform 0.3s; } .certificates li img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 10px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .certificates li:hover { transform: scale(1.02); } footer { text-align: center; padding: 20px 0; background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8); color: #fff; width: 100%; } .social-icons { margin-top: 10px; } .social-icons a { margin: 0 10px; display: inline-block; transition: transform 0.3s; } .social-icons a:hover { transform: scale(1.2); } .social-icons img { width: 30px; height: 30px; object-fit: cover; } /* Animations */ @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; } to { opacity: 1; } } @keyframes fadeInUp { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } @keyframes slideInDown { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } @keyframes zoomIn { from { transform: scale(0.8); opacity: 0; } to { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } } </style> </head> <body> <header> <h1>Chandru V</h1> <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V"> <p>Portfolio</p> </header> <nav> <a href="#about-me">About</a> <a href="#skills">Skills</a> <a href="#projects">Projects</a> <a href="#certificates">Certificates</a> <a href="#contact">Contact</a> </nav> <div class="container"> <section id="about-me" class="about-me"> <h2>About Me</h2> <p>I am Chandru, a passionate web developer and UI/UX designer based in Coimbatore, India. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I create responsive and user-friendly websites. I am also experienced in C++, Java, and React.js.</p> </section> <section id="skills" class="skills"> <h2>Skills</h2> <ul> <li>HTML5</li> <li>CSS3</li> <li>JavaScript</li> <li>C++</li> <li>React.js</li> </ul> </section> <section id="projects" class="projects"> <h2>Projects</h2> <div class="project"> <h3>Virtual Animal</h3> <p>A project that allows users to adopt virtual pets, providing a fun and engaging way to learn about animal care.</p> <p><a href="file:///C:/Users/Admin/OneDrive/Desktop/VIRTUAL%20ANIMAL/adoption.html" target="_blank">View Project</a></p> </div> <!-- Add more projects as needed --> </section> <section id="certificates" class="certificates"> <h2>Certificates</h2> <ul> <li> <h3>Matlab Onramp</h3> <img src="MatLab.png" alt="Certificate 1"> </li> <li> <h3>Codsoft</h3> <img src="Codsoft.png" alt="Certificate 2"> </li> <!-- Add more certificates as needed --> </ul> </section> <section id="contact" class="contact"> <h2>Contact</h2> <p>Email: <a href="mailto:chandruv089@gmail.com">chandruv089@gmail.com</a></p> <p>Phone: <a href="tel:+917305951073">+91-7305951073</a></p> <p>Address: Coimbatore, India</p> <div class="social-icons"> <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/chandru-venkatesan-976848258/" target="_blank"> <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/174/174857.png" alt="LinkedIn"> </a> <a href="https://github.com/your-github-username" target="_blank"> <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/733/733609.png" alt="GitHub"> </a> </div> </section> </div> <footer> <p>&copy; 2024 Chandru V. All rights reserved.</p> </footer> </body> </html> add internship topic and its certificate

To add an internship section and its certificate to your portfolio, you can extend your HTML and CSS as follows:

Updated HTML

Add a new section for internships and certificates:

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Portfolio - Chandru V</title>
    <style>
        /* CSS Reset */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        body {
            font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            background: url('Background Portfolio.avif') no-repeat center center fixed;
            background-size: cover;
            color: #333;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
        }
        header {
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            padding: 20px 0;
            text-align: center;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        header img {
            width: 200px;
            height: 200px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            object-fit: cover;
            position: absolute;
            top: 20px;
            right: 20px;
            border: 4px solid #fff;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
            animation: zoomIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        nav {
            background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8);
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: 10px 0;
            width: 100%;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }
        nav a {
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 14px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
            border-radius: 4px;
        }
        nav a:hover {
            background: rgba(85, 85, 85, 0.8);
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        h1 {
            font-size: 2.5em;
            margin: 0;
            animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out;
        }
        h2 {
            font-size: 1.8em;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            color: #333;
            animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out;
        }
        p {
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        .container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 20px;
            padding: 20px;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 1200px;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        @media (min-width: 1024px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        .about-me, .skills, .projects, .certificates, .internships, .contact {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid #ccc;
            animation: fadeInUp 1s ease-out;
        }
        ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        li:hover {
            background: #d0d0d0;
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        .project {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .certificates ul, .internships ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        .certificates li, .internships li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li img, .internships li img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li:hover, .internships li:hover {
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        footer {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px 0;
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            width: 100%;
        }
        .social-icons {
            margin-top: 10px;
        }
        .social-icons a {
            margin: 0 10px;
            display: inline-block;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .social-icons a:hover {
            transform: scale(1.2);
        }
        .social-icons img {
            width: 30px;
            height: 30px;
            object-fit: cover;
        }

        /* Animations */
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
        @keyframes fadeInUp {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes slideInDown {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(-20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes zoomIn {
            from {
                transform: scale(0.8);
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                transform: scale(1);
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <header>
        <h1>Chandru V</h1>
        <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V">
        <p>Portfolio</p>
    </header>
    
    <nav>
        <a href="#about-me">About</a>
        <a href="#skills">Skills</a>
        <a href="#projects">Projects</a>
        <a href="#certificates">Certificates</a>
        <a href="#internships">Internships</a>
        <a href="#contact">Contact</a>
    </nav>

    <div class="container">
        <section id="about-me" class="about-me">
            <h2>About Me</h2>
            <p>I am Chandru, a passionate web developer and UI/UX designer based in Coimbatore, India. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I create responsive and user-friendly websites. I am also experienced in C++, Java, and React.js.</p>
        </section>

        <section id="skills" class="skills">
            <h2>Skills</h2>
            <ul>
                <li>HTML5</li>
                <li>CSS3</li>
                <li>JavaScript</li>
                <li>C++</li>
                <li>React.js</li>
            </ul>
        </section>

        <section id="projects" class="projects">
            <h2>Projects</h2>

            <div class="project">
                <h3>Virtual Animal</h3>
                <p>A project that allows users to adopt virtual pets, providing a fun and engaging way to learn about animal care.</p>
                <p><a href="file:///C:/Users/Admin/OneDrive/Desktop/VIRTUAL%20ANIMAL/adoption.html" target="_blank">View Project</a></p>
            </div>

            <!-- Add more projects as needed -->
        </section>

        <section id="certificates" class="certificates">
            <h2>Certificates</h2>
            <ul>
                <li>
                    <h3>Matlab Onramp</h3>
                    <img src="MatLab.png" alt="Certificate 1">
                </li>
                <li>
                    <h3>Codsoft</h3>
                    <img src="Codsoft.png" alt="Certificate 2">
                </li>
                <!-- Add more certificates as needed -->
            </ul>
        </section>

        <section id="internships" class="internships">
            <h2>Internships</h2>
            <ul>
                <li>
                    <h3>XYZ Company Internship</h3>
                    <p>Worked on developing web applications using modern technologies, gained experience in team collaboration and project management.</p>
                    <img src="internship_certificate.png" alt="Internship Certificate">
                </li>
                <!-- Add more internships as needed -->
            </ul>
        </section>

        <section id="contact" class="contact">
            <h2>Contact</h2>
            <p>Email: <a href="mailto:chandruv089@gmail.com">chandruv089@gmail.com</a></p>
            <p>Phone: <a href="tel:+917305951073">+91-7305951073</a></p>
            <p>Address: Coimbatore, India</p>
            <div class="social-icons">
                <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/chandru-venkatesan-976848258/" target="_blank">
                    <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/174/174857.png" alt="LinkedIn">
                </a>
                <a href="https://github.com/your-github-username" target="_blank">
                    <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/733/733609.png" alt="GitHub">
                </a>
            </div>
        </section>
    </div>

    <footer>
        <p>&copy; 2024 Chandru V. All rights reserved.</p>
    </footer>
</body>
</html>

Key Additions:

  1. Internship Section: Added a new section with the ID internships to list your internships. Include a description and an image of the internship certificate.

  2. CSS Updates: Added styles for the internships section similar to the certificates section to maintain consistency.

  3. Navigation Link: Added a link to the new internships section in the navigation menu.

You can replace "internship_certificate.png" with the actual file name of your internship certificate image and adjust the details as needed.

Worked on developing web applications using modern technologies, gained experience in team collaboration and project management. change this sentence about embedded system

Sure! Heres a revised version of that sentence, focusing on embedded systems:

"Worked on developing embedded systems applications, gaining hands-on experience with hardware-software integration, real-time operating systems, and system optimization."

Feel free to adjust it based on the specific details of your internship experience!

<!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Portfolio - Chandru V</title> <style> /* CSS Reset */ * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; } body { font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0; padding: 0; background: url('Background Portfolio.avif') no-repeat center center fixed; background-size: cover; color: #333; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; } header { background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8); color: #fff; padding: 20px 0; text-align: center; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); width: 100%; position: relative; animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out; } header img { width: 200px; height: 200px; border-radius: 50%; object-fit: cover; position: absolute; top: 20px; right: 20px; border: 4px solid #fff; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); animation: zoomIn 2s ease-out; } nav { background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; padding: 10px 0; width: 100%; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } nav a { color: #fff; text-align: center; padding: 14px 20px; text-decoration: none; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; border-radius: 4px; } nav a:hover { background: rgba(85, 85, 85, 0.8); transform: scale(1.1); } h1 { font-size: 2.5em; margin: 0; animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out; } h2 { font-size: 1.8em; margin-bottom: 10px; color: #333; animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out; } p { margin-bottom: 10px; } .container { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 20px; padding: 20px; width: 100%; max-width: 1200px; box-sizing: border-box; animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out; } @media (min-width: 768px) { .container { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; } } @media (min-width: 1024px) { .container { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr; } } .about-me, .skills, .projects, .certificates, .internships, .contact { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9); padding: 20px; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); border: 1px solid #ccc; animation: fadeInUp 1s ease-out; } ul { list-style-type: none; padding: 0; } li { background: #e7e7e7; margin: 5px 0; padding: 10px; border-radius: 4px; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; } li:hover { background: #d0d0d0; transform: scale(1.02); } .project { margin-bottom: 20px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .project img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 8px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .project a { display: inline-block; background: #333; color: #fff; padding: 10px 20px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 4px; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; } .project a:hover { background: #555; transform: scale(1.1); } .certificates ul, .internships ul { list-style-type: none; padding: 0; } .certificates li, .internships li { background: #e7e7e7; margin: 5px 0; padding: 10px; border-radius: 4px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; transition: transform 0.3s; } .certificates li img, .internships li img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 10px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .certificates li:hover, .internships li:hover { transform: scale(1.02); } footer { text-align: center; padding: 20px 0; background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8); color: #fff; width: 100%; } .social-icons { margin-top: 10px; } .social-icons a { margin: 0 10px; display: inline-block; transition: transform 0.3s; } .social-icons a:hover { transform: scale(1.2); } .social-icons img { width: 30px; height: 30px; object-fit: cover; } /* Animations */ @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; } to { opacity: 1; } } @keyframes fadeInUp { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } @keyframes slideInDown { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } @keyframes zoomIn { from { transform: scale(0.8); opacity: 0; } to { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } } </style> </head> <body> <header> <h1>Chandru V</h1> <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V"> <p>Portfolio</p> </header> <nav> <a href="#about-me">About</a> <a href="#skills">Skills</a> <a href="#projects">Projects</a> <a href="#certificates">Certificates</a> <a href="#internships">Internships</a> <a href="#contact">Contact</a> </nav> <div class="container"> <section id="about-me" class="about-me"> <h2>About Me</h2> <p>I am Chandru, a passionate web developer and UI/UX designer based in Coimbatore, India. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I create responsive and user-friendly websites. I am also experienced in C++, Java, and React.js.</p> </section> <section id="skills" class="skills"> <h2>Skills</h2> <ul> <li>HTML5</li> <li>CSS3</li> <li>JavaScript</li> <li>C++</li> <li>React.js</li> </ul> </section> <section id="projects" class="projects"> <h2>Projects</h2> <div class="project"> <h3>Virtual Animal</h3> <p>A project that allows users to adopt virtual pets, providing a fun and engaging way to learn about animal care.</p> <p><a href="file:///C:/Users/Admin/OneDrive/Desktop/VIRTUAL%20ANIMAL/adoption.html" target="_blank">View Project</a></p> </div> <!-- Add more projects as needed --> </section> <section id="certificates" class="certificates"> <h2>Certificates</h2> <ul> <li> <h3>Matlab Onramp</h3> <img src="MatLab.png" alt="Certificate 1"> </li> <li> <h3>Codsoft</h3> <img src="Codsoft.png" alt="Certificate 2"> </li> <!-- Add more certificates as needed --> </ul> </section> <section id="internships" class="internships"> <h2>Internships</h2> <ul> <li> <h3>Krish Tec Company Internship</h3> <p>Worked on developing embedded systems applications, gaining hands-on experience with hardware-software integration, real-time operating systems, and system optimization.</p> <img src="Internship Krish tec.jpg" alt="Internship Certificate"> </li> <!-- Add more internships as needed --> </ul> </section> <section id="contact" class="contact"> <h2>Contact</h2> <p>Email: <a href="mailto:chandruv089@gmail.com">chandruv089@gmail.com</a></p> <p>Phone: <a href="tel:+917305951073">+91-7305951073</a></p> <p>Address: Coimbatore, India</p> <div class="social-icons"> <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/chandru-venkatesan-976848258/" target="_blank"> <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/174/174857.png" alt="LinkedIn"> </a> <a href="https://github.com/your-github-username" target="_blank"> <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/733/733609.png" alt="GitHub"> </a> </div> </section> </div> <footer> <p>&copy; 2024 Chandru V. All rights reserved.</p> </footer> </body> </html> change attractive on this web page as so impressive

To make your webpage more impressive and attractive, you can enhance the design and layout with a few modifications. Heres how you can update the existing design:

  1. Add a Hero Section: Include a full-width hero section with a background image and a call-to-action.
  2. Use a Modern Font: Integrate Google Fonts for a more stylish text appearance.
  3. Implement Smooth Scrolling: Ensure smooth scrolling between sections.
  4. Enhance the Project Section: Include more interactive elements and visually appealing layouts.
  5. Add Hover Effects: Add more subtle hover effects for better interaction.
  6. Improve the Color Scheme: Use a more cohesive color scheme and add some gradient backgrounds.

Heres an updated version of your HTML and CSS with these improvements:

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Portfolio - Chandru V</title>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        /* CSS Reset */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        body {
            font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            background: url('Background Portfolio.avif') no-repeat center center fixed;
            background-size: cover;
            color: #333;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
        }
        header {
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            padding: 20px 0;
            text-align: center;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        header img {
            width: 150px;
            height: 150px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            object-fit: cover;
            position: absolute;
            top: 20px;
            right: 20px;
            border: 4px solid #fff;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
            animation: zoomIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        nav {
            background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8);
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: 10px 0;
            width: 100%;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }
        nav a {
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 14px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
            border-radius: 4px;
        }
        nav a:hover {
            background: rgba(85, 85, 85, 0.8);
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .hero {
            background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8), rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.6)), url('hero-background.jpg') no-repeat center center;
            background-size: cover;
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 100px 20px;
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
        }
        .hero h1 {
            font-size: 3em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out;
        }
        .hero p {
            font-size: 1.2em;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        .hero a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .hero a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 20px;
            padding: 20px;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 1200px;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        @media (min-width: 1024px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        .section {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid #ccc;
            animation: fadeInUp 1s ease-out;
        }
        h2 {
            font-size: 2em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            color: #333;
            animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out;
        }
        p {
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        li:hover {
            background: #d0d0d0;
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        .project {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .certificates ul, .internships ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        .certificates li, .internships li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li img, .internships li img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li:hover, .internships li:hover {
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        footer {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px 0;
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            width: 100%;
        }
        .social-icons {
            margin-top: 10px;
        }
        .social-icons a {
            margin: 0 10px;
            display: inline-block;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .social-icons a:hover {
            transform: scale(1.2);
        }
        .social-icons img {
            width: 30px;
            height: 30px;
            object-fit: cover;
        }

        /* Animations */
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
        @keyframes fadeInUp {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes slideInDown {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(-20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes zoomIn {
            from {
                transform: scale(0.8);
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                transform: scale(1);
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <header>
        <h1>Chandru V</h1>
        <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V">
        <p>Portfolio</p>
    </header>
    
    <nav>
        <a href="#about-me">About</a>
        <a href="#skills">Skills</a>
        <a href="#projects">Projects</a>
        <a href="#certificates">Certificates</a>
        <a href="#internships">Internships</a>
        <a href="#contact">Contact</a>
    </nav>

    <section class="hero">
        <h1>Welcome to My Portfolio</h1>
        <p>Explore my work, skills, and experiences. Feel free to get in touch!</p>

    </section>

    <div class="container">
        <section id="about-me" class="section about-me">

        <section id="skills" class="section skills">

Key Updates:

  • Hero Section: Added a full-width hero section for a strong first impression.
  • Google Fonts: Integrated the Google Font "Roboto" for a modern look.
  • Smooth Scrolling: Enabled smooth scrolling with scroll-behavior: smooth.
  • Enhanced Styles: Improved styling with modern color gradients, updated spacing, and subtle hover effects.

Feel free to adjust the images and links to match your actual content!

<!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Portfolio - Chandru V</title> <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet"> <style> /* CSS Reset */ * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; } body { font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0; padding: 0; background: url('Background Portfolio.avif') no-repeat center center fixed; background-size: cover; color: #333; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; scroll-behavior: smooth; } header { background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8); color: #fff; padding: 20px 0; text-align: center; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); width: 100%; position: relative; animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out; } header img { width: 150px; height: 150px; border-radius: 50%; object-fit: cover; position: absolute; top: 20px; right: 20px; border: 4px solid #fff; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); animation: zoomIn 2s ease-out; } nav { background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; padding: 10px 0; width: 100%; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); transform: scale(1.1); } .hero { background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8), rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.6)), url('hero-background.jpg') no-repeat center center; background-size: cover; color: #fff; text-align: center; padding: 100px 20px; width: 100%; position: relative; } .hero h1 { font-size: 3em; margin-bottom: 20px; animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out; } .hero p { font-size: 1.2em; margin-bottom: 30px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .project img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 8px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .project a { display: inline-block; background: #333; color: #fff; padding: 10px 20px; Sure, here's the updated HTML with the "Welcome to My Portfolio" section changed to describe you:

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Portfolio - Chandru V</title>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        /* CSS Reset */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        body {
            font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            background: url('Background Portfolio.avif') no-repeat center center fixed;
            background-size: cover;
            color: #333;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
        }
        header {
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            padding: 20px 0;
            text-align: center;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        header img {
            width: 150px;
            height: 150px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            object-fit: cover;
            position: absolute;
            top: 20px;
            right: 20px;
            border: 4px solid #fff;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
            animation: zoomIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        nav {
            background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8);
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: 10px 0;
            width: 100%;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }
        nav a {
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 14px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
            border-radius: 4px;
        }
        nav a:hover {
            background: rgba(85, 85, 85, 0.8);
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .hero {
            background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8), rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.6)), url('hero-background.jpg') no-repeat center center;
            background-size: cover;
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 100px 20px;
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
        }
        .hero h1 {
            font-size: 3em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out;
        }
        .hero p {
            font-size: 1.2em;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        .hero a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .hero a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 20px;
            padding: 20px;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 1200px;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        @media (min-width: 1024px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        .section {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid #ccc;
            animation: fadeInUp 1s ease-out;
        }
        h2 {
            font-size: 2em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            color: #333;
            animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out;
        }
        p {
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        li:hover {
            background: #d0d0d0;
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        .project {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .certificates ul, .internships ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        .certificates li, .internships li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li img, .internships li img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li:hover, .internships li:hover {
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        footer {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px 0;
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            width: 100%;
        }
        .social-icons {
            margin-top: 10px;
        }
        .social-icons a {
            margin: 0 10px;
            display: inline-block;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .social-icons a:hover {
            transform: scale(1.2);
        }
        .social-icons img {
            width: 30px;
            height: 30px;
            object-fit: cover;
        }

        /* Animations */
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
        @keyframes fadeInUp {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes slideInDown {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(-20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes zoomIn {
            from {
                transform: scale(0.8);
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                transform: scale(1);
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <header>
        <h1>Chandru V</h1>
        <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V">
        <p>Portfolio</p>
    </header>
    
    <nav>
        <a href="#about-me">About</a>
        <a href="#skills">Skills</a>
        <a href="#projects">Projects</a>
        <a href="#certificates">Certificates</a>
        <a href="#internships">Internships</a>
        <a href="#contact">Contact</a>
    </nav>

    <section class="hero">
        <h1>Chandru V - Web Developer & UI/UX Designer</h1>
        <p>Hi, I'm Chandru, a dedicated web developer and UI/UX designer from Coimbatore, India. I specialize in creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites. My expertise spans HTML, CSS, JavaScript, C++, Java, and React.js. I am passionate about bringing ideas to life through code and design.</p>
        <a href="#contact">Contact Me</a>
    </section>

    <div class="container">
        <section id="about-me" class="section about-me">
            <h2>About Me</h2>
            <p>I am Chandru, a passionate web developer and UI/UX designer based in Coimbatore, India. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I create responsive and user-friendly websites. I am also experienced in C++, Java, and React.js.</p>
        </section>

        <section id="skills" class="section skills">

put the profile image as much bigger on right corner top

Sure, here's the updated HTML code with the profile image enlarged and positioned in the top right corner:

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Portfolio - Chandru V</title>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        /* CSS Reset */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        body {
            font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            background: url('Background Portfolio.avif') no-repeat center center fixed;
            background-size: cover;
            color: #333;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
        }
        header {
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            padding: 20px 0;
            text-align: center;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        header img {
            width: 300px;
            height: 300px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            object-fit: cover;
            position: absolute;
            top: 20px;
            right: 20px;
            border: 4px solid #fff;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
            animation: zoomIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        nav {
            background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8);
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: 10px 0;
            width: 100%;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }
        nav a {
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 14px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
            border-radius: 4px;
        }
        nav a:hover {
            background: rgba(85, 85, 85, 0.8);
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .hero {
            background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8), rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.6)), url('hero-background.jpg') no-repeat center center;
            background-size: cover;
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 100px 20px;
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
        }
        .hero h1 {
            font-size: 3em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out;
        }
        .hero p {
            font-size: 1.2em;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        .hero a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .hero a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 20px;
            padding: 20px;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 1200px;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        @media (min-width: 1024px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        .section {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid #ccc;
            animation: fadeInUp 1s ease-out;
        }
        h2 {
            font-size: 2em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            color: #333;
            animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out;
        }
        p {
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        li:hover {
            background: #d0d0d0;
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        .project {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .certificates ul, .internships ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        .certificates li, .internships li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li img, .internships li img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li:hover, .internships li:hover {
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        footer {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px 0;
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            width: 100%;
        }
        .social-icons {
            margin-top: 10px;
        }
        .social-icons a {
            margin: 0 10px;
            display: inline-block;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .social-icons a:hover {
            transform: scale(1.2);
        }
        .social-icons img {
            width: 30px;
            height: 30px;
            object-fit: cover;
        }

        /* Animations */
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
        @keyframes fadeInUp {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes slideInDown {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(-20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes zoomIn {
            from {
                transform: scale(0.8);
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                transform: scale(1);
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <header>
        <h1>Chandru V</h1>
        <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V">
        <p>Portfolio</p>
    </header>
    
    <nav>
        <a href="#about-me">About</a>

        <a href="#projects">Projects</a>

        <a href="#internships">Internships</a>
        <a href="#contact">Contact</a>
    </nav>

    <section class="hero">
        <h1>Chandru V - Web Developer & UI/UX Designer</h1>
        <p>Hi, I'm Chandru, a dedicated web developer and UI/UX designer from Coimbatore, India. I specialize in creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites. My expertise spans HTML, CSS, JavaScript, C++, Java, and React.js. I am passionate about bringing ideas to life through code and design.</p>
        <a href="#contact">Contact Me</a>
    </section>

    <div class="container">
        <section id="about-me" class="section about-me">
            <h2>About Me</h2>
            <p>I am Chandru, a passionate web developer and UI/UX designer based in Coimbatore, India. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I create responsive and user-friendly websites. I am also experienced in C++, Java, and React.js.</p>
        </section>

        <section id="skills" class="section skills">
            <h2>Skills</h2>
            <ul>
                <li>HTML5</li>
                <li>CSS3</li>
                <li>JavaScript</li>
                <li>C++</li>
                <li>React.js</li>
            </ul>
        </section>

        <section id="projects" class="section projects">
            <h2>Projects</h2>

            <div class="project">
                <h3>Virtual Animal</h3>
                <p>A project that allows users to adopt virtual pets, providing a fun and engaging way to learn about animal care.</p>
                <p><a href="file:///C:/Users/Admin/OneDrive/Desktop/VIRTUAL%20ANIMAL/adoption.html" target="_blank">View Project</a></p>
            </div>

            <!-- Add more projects as needed -->
        </section>

        <section id="certificates" class="section certificates">
            <h2>Certificates</h2>
            <ul>
                <li>

                    <img src="MatLab.png" alt="Certificate 1">
                </li>

                    <img src="Codsoft.png" alt="Certificate 2">
                </li>

            <ul>
