In this code, the profile image is now significantly larger and placed in the top right corner of the header. The image size has been increased to 300x300 pixels, and it is styled to be positioned at the top right with some additional styling for a neat appearance.

<!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Portfolio - Chandru V</title> <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet"> <style> /* CSS Reset */ * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; } body { font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0; padding: 0; background: url('Background Portfolio.avif') no-repeat center center fixed; background-size: cover; color: #333; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; scroll-behavior: smooth; } header { background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8); color: #fff; padding: 20px 0; text-align: center; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); width: 100%; position: relative; animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out; } header img { width: 300px; height: 300px; border-radius: 50%; object-fit: cover; position: absolute; top: 20px; right: 20px; border: 4px solid #fff; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); animation: zoomIn 2s ease-out; } nav { background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; padding: 10px 0; width: 100%; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } nav a { color: #fff; text-align: center; padding: 14px 20px; text-decoration: none; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; border-radius: 4px; } nav a:hover { background: rgba(85, 85, 85, 0.8); transform: scale(1.1); } .hero { background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8), rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.6)), url('hero-background.jpg') no-repeat center center; background-size: cover; color: #fff; text-align: center; padding: 100px 20px; width: 100%; position: relative; } .hero h1 { font-size: 3em; margin-bottom: 20px; animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out; } .hero p { font-size: 1.2em; margin-bottom: 30px; } .hero a { display: inline-block; background: #333; color: #fff; padding: 10px 20px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 4px; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; } .hero a:hover { background: #555; transform: scale(1.1); } .container { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 20px; padding: 20px; width: 100%; max-width: 1200px; box-sizing: border-box; animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out; } @media (min-width: 768px) { .container { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; } } @media (min-width: 1024px) { .container { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr; } } .section { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9); padding: 20px; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); border: 1px solid #ccc; animation: fadeInUp 1s ease-out; } h2 { font-size: 2em; margin-bottom: 20px; color: #333; animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out; } p { margin-bottom: 10px; } ul { list-style-type: none; padding: 0; } li { background: #e7e7e7; margin: 5px 0; padding: 10px; border-radius: 4px; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; } li:hover { background: #d0d0d0; transform: scale(1.02); } .project { margin-bottom: 20px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .project img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 8px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .project a { display: inline-block; background: #333; color: #fff; padding: 10px 20px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 4px; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; } .project a:hover { background: #555; transform: scale(1.1); } .certificates ul, .internships ul { list-style-type: none; padding: 0; } .certificates li, .internships li { background: #e7e7e7; margin: 5px 0; padding: 10px; border-radius: 4px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; transition: transform 0.3s; } .certificates li img, .internships li img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 10px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .certificates li:hover, .internships li:hover { transform: scale(1.02); } footer { text-align: center; padding: 20px 0; background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8); color: #fff; width: 100%; } .social-icons { margin-top: 10px; } .social-icons a { margin: 0 10px; display: inline-block; transition: transform 0.3s; } .social-icons a:hover { transform: scale(1.2); } .social-icons img { width: 30px; height: 30px; object-fit: cover; } /* Animations */ @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; } to { opacity: 1; } } @keyframes fadeInUp { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } @keyframes slideInDown { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } @keyframes zoomIn { from { transform: scale(0.8); opacity: 0; } to { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } } </style> </head> <body> <header> <h1>Chandru V</h1> <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V"> <p>Portfolio</p> </header> <nav> <a href="#about-me">About</a> <a href="#skills">Skills</a> <a href="#projects">Projects</a> <a href="#certificates">Certificates</a> <a href="#internships">Internships</a> <a href="#contact">Contact</a> </nav> <section class="hero"> <h1>Chandru V - Web Developer & UI/UX Designer</h1> <p>Hi, I'm Chandru, a dedicated web developer and UI/UX designer from Coimbatore, India. I specialize in creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites. My expertise spans HTML, CSS, JavaScript, C++, Java, and React.js. I am passionate about bringing ideas to life through code and design.</p> <a href="#contact">Contact Me</a> </section> <div class="container"> <section id="about-me" class="section about-me"> <h2>About Me</h2> <p>I am Chandru, a passionate web developer and UI/UX designer based in Coimbatore, India. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I create responsive and user-friendly websites. I am also experienced in C++, Java, and React.js.</p> </section> <section id="skills" class="section skills"> <h2>Skills</h2> <ul> <li>HTML5</li> <li>CSS3</li> <li>JavaScript</li> <li>C++</li> <li>React.js</li> </ul> </section> <section id="projects" class="section projects"> <h2>Projects</h2> <div class="project"> <h3>Virtual Animal</h3> <p>A project that allows users to adopt virtual pets, providing a fun and engaging way to learn about animal care.</p> <p><a href="file:///C:/Users/Admin/OneDrive/Desktop/VIRTUAL%20ANIMAL/adoption.html" target="_blank">View Project</a></p> </div> <!-- Add more projects as needed --> </section> <section id="certificates" class="section certificates"> <h2>Certificates</h2> <ul> <li> <h3>Matlab Onramp</h3> <img src="MatLab.png" alt="Certificate 1"> </li> <li> <h3>Codsoft</h3> <img src="Codsoft.png" alt="Certificate 2"> </li> <!-- Add more certificates as needed --> </ul> </section> <section id="internships" class="section internships"> <h2>Internships</h2> <ul> <li> <h3>Krish Tec Company Internship</h3> <p>Worked on developing embedded systems applications, gaining hands-on experience with hardware-software integration, real-time operating systems, and system optimization.</p> <img src="Internship Krish tec.jpg" alt="Internship Certificate"> </li> <!-- Add more internships as needed --> </ul> </section> <section id="contact" class="section contact"> <h2>Contact</h2> <p>Email: <a href="mailto:chandruv089@gmail.com">chandruv089@gmail.com</a></p> <p>Phone: <a href="tel:+917305951073">+91-7305951073</a></p> <p>Address: Coimbatore, India</p> <div class="social-icons"> <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/chandru-venkatesan-976848258/" target="_blank"> <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/174/174857.png" alt="LinkedIn"> </a> <a href="https://github.com/your-github-username" target="_blank"> <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/733/733609.png" alt="GitHub"> </a> </div> </section> </div> <footer> <p>&copy; 2024 Chandru V. All rights reserved.</p> </footer> </body> </html> put the background as white on describe me topic

To make the "About Me" section's background white, you can specifically target that section with a CSS rule. Here's how you can adjust the CSS to set a white background for the "About Me" section while keeping the rest of the design intact:

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Portfolio - Chandru V</title>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        /* CSS Reset */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        body {
            font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            background: url('Background Portfolio.avif') no-repeat center center fixed;
            background-size: cover;
            color: #333;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
        }
        header {
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            padding: 20px 0;
            text-align: center;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        header img {
            width: 300px;
            height: 300px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            object-fit: cover;
            position: absolute;
            top: 20px;
            right: 20px;
            border: 4px solid #fff;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
            animation: zoomIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        nav {
            background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8);
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: 10px 0;
            width: 100%;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }
        nav a {
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 14px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
            border-radius: 4px;
        }
        nav a:hover {
            background: rgba(85, 85, 85, 0.8);
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .hero {
            background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8), rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.6)), url('hero-background.jpg') no-repeat center center;
            background-size: cover;
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 100px 20px;
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
        }
        .hero h1 {
            font-size: 3em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out;
        }
        .hero p {
            font-size: 1.2em;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        .hero a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .hero a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 20px;
            padding: 20px;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 1200px;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        @media (min-width: 1024px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        .section {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid #ccc;
            animation: fadeInUp 1s ease-out;
        }
        .about-me {
            background: #fff; /* Set background to white */
        }
        h2 {
            font-size: 2em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            color: #333;
            animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out;
        }
        p {
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        li:hover {
            background: #d0d0d0;
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        .project {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .certificates ul, .internships ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        .certificates li, .internships li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li img, .internships li img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li:hover, .internships li:hover {
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        footer {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px 0;
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            width: 100%;
        }
        .social-icons {
            margin-top: 10px;
        }
        .social-icons a {
            margin: 0 10px;
            display: inline-block;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .social-icons a:hover {
            transform: scale(1.2);
        }
        .social-icons img {
            width: 30px;
            height: 30px;
            object-fit: cover;
        }

        /* Animations */
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
        @keyframes fadeInUp {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes slideInDown {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(-20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes zoomIn {
            from {
                transform: scale(0.8);
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                transform: scale(1);
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <header>
        <h1>Chandru V</h1>
        <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V">
        <p>Portfolio</p>
    </header>
    
    <nav>
        <a href="#about-me">About</a>
        <a href="#skills">Skills</a>
        <a href="#projects">Projects</a>
        <a href="#certificates">Certificates</a>
        <a href="#internships">Internships</a>
        <a href="#contact">Contact</a>
    </nav>

    <section class="hero">
        <h1>Chandru V - Web Developer & UI/UX Designer</h1>
        <p>Hi, I'm Chandru, a dedicated web developer and UI/UX designer from Coimbatore, India. I specialize in creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites. My expertise spans HTML, CSS, JavaScript, C++, Java, and React.js. I am passionate about bringing ideas to life through code and design.</p>
        <a href="#contact">Contact Me</a>
    </section>

    <div class="container">
        <section id="about-me" class="section about-me">
            <h2>About Me</h2>
            <p>I am Chandru, a passionate web developer and UI/UX designer based in Coimbatore, India. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I create responsive and user-friendly websites. I am also experienced in C++, Java, and React.js.</p>
        </section>

        <section id="skills" class="section skills">
            <h2>Skills</h2>
            <ul>
                <li>HTML5</li>
                <li>CSS3</li>
                <li>JavaScript</li>
                <li>C++</li>
                <li>React.js</li>
            </ul>
        </section>

        <section id="projects" class="section projects">
            <h2>Projects</h2>

            <div class="project">
                <h3>Virtual Animal</h3>
                <p>A project that allows users to adopt virtual pets, providing a fun and engaging way to learn about animal care.</p>
                <p><a href="file:///C:/Users/Admin/OneDrive/Desktop/VIRTUAL%20ANIMAL/adoption.html" target="_blank">View Project</a></p>
            </div>

            <!-- Add more projects as needed -->
        </section>

        <section id="certificates" class="section certificates">
            <h2>Certificates</h2>
            <ul>
                <li>
                    <h3>Matlab Onramp</h3>
                    <img src="MatLab.png" alt="Certificate 1">
                </li>
                <li>
                    <h3>Codsoft</h3>
                    <img src="Codsoft.png" alt="Certificate 2">
                </li>
                <!-- Add more certificates as needed -->
            </ul>
        </section>

        <section id="internships" class="section internships">
            <h2>Internships</h2>
            <ul>
                <li>
                    <h3>Krish Tec Company Internship</h3>
                    <p>Worked on developing embedded systems applications, gaining hands-on experience with hardware-software integration, real-time operating systems, and system optimization.</p>
                    <img src="Internship Krish tec.jpg" alt="Internship Certificate">
                </li>
                <!-- Add more internships as needed -->
            </ul>
        </section>

        <section id="contact" class="section contact">
            <h2>Contact</h2>
            <p>Email: <a href="mailto:chandruv089@gmail.com">chandruv089@gmail.com</a></p>
            <p>Phone: <a href="tel:+917305951073">+91-7305951073</a></p>
            <p>Address: Coimbatore, India</p>
            <div class="social-icons">
                <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/chandru-venkatesan-976848258/" target="_blank">
                    <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/174/174857.png" alt="LinkedIn">
                </a>
                <a href="https://github.com/your-github-username" target="_blank">
                    <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/733/733609.png" alt="GitHub">
                </a>
            </div>
        </section>
    </div>

    <footer>
        <p>&copy; 2024 Chandru V. All rights reserved.</p>
    </footer>
</body>
</html>

In this code, I've added the following CSS rule:

css
.about-me {
    background: #fff; /* Set background to white */
}

This ensures that the background of the "About Me" section is set to white, making it stand out with a clean and clear appearance against the rest of the design.

not yet changed

Let's make sure that the "About Me" section has a distinct white background by modifying the HTML and CSS accordingly.

Here is the complete HTML code with the "About Me" section styled to have a white background:

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Portfolio - Chandru V</title>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        /* CSS Reset */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        body {
            font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            background: url('Background Portfolio.avif') no-repeat center center fixed;
            background-size: cover;
            color: #333;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
        }
        header {
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            padding: 20px 0;
            text-align: center;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        header img {
            width: 300px;
            height: 300px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            object-fit: cover;
            position: absolute;
            top: 20px;
            right: 20px;
            border: 4px solid #fff;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
            animation: zoomIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        nav {
            background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8);
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: 10px 0;
            width: 100%;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }
        nav a {
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 14px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
            border-radius: 4px;
        }
        nav a:hover {
            background: rgba(85, 85, 85, 0.8);
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .hero {
            background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8), rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.6)), url('hero-background.jpg') no-repeat center center;
            background-size: cover;
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 100px 20px;
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
        }
        .hero h1 {
            font-size: 3em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out;
        }
        .hero p {
            font-size: 1.2em;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        .hero a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .hero a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 20px;
            padding: 20px;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 1200px;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        @media (min-width: 1024px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        .section {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid #ccc;
            animation: fadeInUp 1s ease-out;
        }
        .about-me {
            background: #fff; /* Set background to white */
        }
        h2 {
            font-size: 2em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            color: #333;
            animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out;
        }
        p {
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        li:hover {
            background: #d0d0d0;
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        .project {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .certificates ul, .internships ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        .certificates li, .internships li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li img, .internships li img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li:hover, .internships li:hover {
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        footer {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px 0;
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            width: 100%;
        }
        .social-icons {
            margin-top: 10px;
        }
        .social-icons a {
            margin: 0 10px;
            display: inline-block;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .social-icons a:hover {
            transform: scale(1.2);
        }
        .social-icons img {
            width: 30px;
            height: 30px;
            object-fit: cover;
        }

        /* Animations */
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
        @keyframes fadeInUp {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes slideInDown {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(-20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes zoomIn {
            from {
                transform: scale(0.8);
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                transform: scale(1);
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <header>
        <h1>Chandru V</h1>
        <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V">
        <p>Portfolio</p>
    </header>
    
    <nav>
        <a href="#about-me">About</a>
        <a href="#skills">Skills</a>
        <a href="#projects">Projects</a>
        <a href="#certificates">Certificates</a>
        <a href="#internships">Internships</a>
        <a href="#contact">Contact</a>
    </nav>

    <section class="hero">
        <h1>Chandru V - Web Developer & UI/UX Designer</h1>
        <p>Hi, I'm Chandru, a dedicated web developer and UI/UX designer from Coimbatore, India. I specialize in creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites. My expertise spans HTML, CSS, JavaScript, C++, Java, and React.js. I am passionate about bringing ideas to life through code and design.</p>
        <a href="#contact">Contact Me</a>
    </section>

    <div class="container">
        <section id="about-me" class="section about-me">
            <h2>About Me</h2>
            <p>I am Chandru, a passionate web developer and UI/UX designer based in Coimbatore, India. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I create responsive and user-friendly websites. I am also experienced in C++, Java, and React.js.</p>
        </section>

        <section id="skills" class="section skills">
            <h2>Skills</h2>
            <ul>
                <li>HTML5</li>
                <li>CSS3</li>
                <li>JavaScript</li>
                <li>C++</li>
                <li>React.js</li>
            </ul>
        </section>

        <section id="projects" class="section projects">
            <h2>Projects</h2>

            <div class="project">
                <h3>Virtual Animal</h3>
                <p>A project that allows users to adopt virtual pets, providing a fun and engaging way to learn about animal care.</p>
                <p><a href="file:///C:/Users/Admin/OneDrive/Desktop/VIRTUAL%20ANIMAL/adoption.html" target="_blank">View Project</a></p>
            </div>

            <!-- Add more projects as needed -->
        </section>

        <section id="certificates" class="section certificates">
            <h2>Certificates</h2>
            <ul>
                <li>
                    <h3>Matlab Onramp</h3>
                    <img src="MatLab.png" alt="Certificate 1">
                </li>
                <li>
                    <h3>Codsoft</h3>
                    <img src="Codsoft.png" alt="Certificate 2">
                </li>
                <!-- Add more certificates as needed -->
            </ul>
        </section>

        <section id="internships" class="section internships">
            <h2>Internships</h2>
            <ul>
                <li>
                    <h3>Krish Tec Company Internship</h3>
                    <p>Worked on developing embedded systems applications, gaining hands-on experience with hardware-software integration, real-time operating systems, and system optimization.</p>
                    <img src="Internship Krish tec.jpg" alt="Internship Certificate">
                </li>
                <!-- Add more internships as needed -->
            </ul>
        </section>

        <section id="contact" class="section contact">
            <h2>Contact</h2>
            <p>Email: <a href="mailto:chandruv089@gmail.com">chandruv089@gmail.com</a></p>
            <p>Phone: <a href="tel:+917305951073">+91-7305951073</a></p>
            <p>Address: Coimbatore, India</p>
            <div class="social-icons">
                <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/chandru-venkatesan-976848258/" target="_blank">
                    <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/174/174857.png" alt="LinkedIn">
                </a>
                <a href="https://github.com/your-github-username" target="_blank">
                    <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/733/733609.png" alt="GitHub">
                </a>
            </div>
        </section>
    </div>

    <footer>
        <p>&copy; 2024 Chandru V. All rights reserved.</p>
    </footer>
</body>
</html>

In this version, the "About Me" section has been given a white background through the background: #fff; property in the CSS. If this still does not reflect correctly, ensure that there is no overriding CSS or browser caching issues. You might also want to clear your browser cache or check in an incognito window to see the changes.

<section class="hero"> <h1>Chandru V - Web Developer & UI/UX Designer</h1> <p>Hi, I'm Chandru, a dedicated web developer and UI/UX designer from Coimbatore, India. I specialize in creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites. My expertise spans HTML, CSS, JavaScript, C++, Java, and React.js. I am passionate about bringing ideas to life through code and design.</p> <a href="#contact">Contact Me</a> </section> put the background under white on this topic

To set the background of the "Hero" section to white, you can update the CSS for the .hero class. Here is the updated HTML and CSS:

HTML

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Portfolio - Chandru V</title>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        /* CSS Reset */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        body {
            font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            background: url('Background Portfolio.avif') no-repeat center center fixed;
            background-size: cover;
            color: #333;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
        }
        header {
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            padding: 20px 0;
            text-align: center;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        header img {
            width: 300px;
            height: 300px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            object-fit: cover;
            position: absolute;
            top: 20px;
            right: 20px;
            border: 4px solid #fff;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
            animation: zoomIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        nav {
            background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8);
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: 10px 0;
            width: 100%;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }
        nav a {
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 14px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
            border-radius: 4px;
        }
        nav a:hover {
            background: rgba(85, 85, 85, 0.8);
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .hero {
            background: #fff; /* Set background to white */
            color: #333;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 100px 20px;
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            border-radius: 8px;
        }
        .hero h1 {
            font-size: 3em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out;
        }
        .hero p {
            font-size: 1.2em;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        .hero a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .hero a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 20px;
            padding: 20px;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 1200px;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        @media (min-width: 1024px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        .section {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid #ccc;
            animation: fadeInUp 1s ease-out;
        }
        .about-me {
            background: #fff; /* Set background to white */
        }
        h2 {
            font-size: 2em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            color: #333;
            animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out;
        }
        p {
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        li:hover {
            background: #d0d0d0;
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        .project {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .certificates ul, .internships ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        .certificates li, .internships li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li img, .internships li img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li:hover, .internships li:hover {
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        footer {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px 0;
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            width: 100%;
        }
        .social-icons {
            margin-top: 10px;
        }
        .social-icons a {
            margin: 0 10px;
            display: inline-block;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .social-icons a:hover {
            transform: scale(1.2);
        }
        .social-icons img {
            width: 30px;
            height: 30px;
            object-fit: cover;
        }

        /* Animations */
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
        @keyframes fadeInUp {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes slideInDown {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(-20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes zoomIn {
            from {
                transform: scale(0.8);
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                transform: scale(1);
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <header>
        <h1>Chandru V</h1>
        <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V">

In this updated version, the .hero class has the background: #fff; property to ensure the background of the hero section is white. Make sure the background: #fff; property is applied within the .hero class in the CSS. If this still does not reflect correctly, check for any CSS conflicts or caching issues.

set the top right corner image as perfectly to this webpage

To position the top right corner image perfectly, you can use CSS to position it absolutely within its containing element.

Heres how you can adjust the CSS to make sure the image is perfectly aligned at the top right corner of the header:

HTML

Ensure that your HTML structure has a wrapper around the image in the header:

html
<header>
    <h1>Chandru V</h1>
    <div class="header-image">
        <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V">
    </div>
    <p>Portfolio</p>
</header>

CSS

Update the CSS to position the image absolutely within the header:

css
header {
    background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
    color: #fff;
    padding: 20px 0;
    text-align: center;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
    animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
    overflow: hidden; /* To ensure the image doesn't overflow */
}

.header-image {
    position: absolute;
    top: 20px; /* Adjust as needed */
    right: 20px; /* Adjust as needed */
    border: 4px solid #fff; /* Optional: Add a border around the image */
    border-radius: 50%; /* Optional: Make the image circular */
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); /* Optional: Add a shadow */
}

.header-image img {
    width: 100px; /* Adjust as needed */
    height: 100px; /* Adjust as needed */
    object-fit: cover; /* Ensure the image covers the specified dimensions */
}

Explanation:

  • position: absolute;: Allows the .header-image container to be positioned relative to the nearest positioned ancestor (in this case, the header which has position: relative;).
  • top: 20px; and right: 20px;: Positions the image 20 pixels from the top and right edges of the header. Adjust these values as needed.
  • border: 4px solid #fff; and border-radius: 50%;: Optional styling to add a border and make the image circular.
  • box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);: Optional shadow to make the image stand out.

Adjust the width and height of the image to suit your design needs. If you want the image to be responsive, you can use percentages or viewport units instead of fixed pixel sizes.

<!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Portfolio - Chandru V</title> <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet"> <style> /* CSS Reset */ * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; } body { font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0; padding: 0; background: url('Background Portfolio.avif') no-repeat center center fixed; background-size: cover; color: #333; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; scroll-behavior: smooth; } header { background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8); color: #fff; padding: 20px 0; text-align: center; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); width: 100%; position: relative; animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out; overflow: hidden; /* To ensure the image doesn't overflow */ } .header-image { position: absolute; top: 20px; /* Adjust as needed */ right: 20px; /* Adjust as needed */ border: 4px solid #fff; /* Optional: Add a border around the image */ border-radius: 50%; /* Optional: Make the image circular */ box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); /* Optional: Add a shadow */ } .header-image img { width: 100px; /* Adjust as needed */ height: 100px; /* Adjust as needed */ object-fit: cover; /* Ensure the image covers the specified dimensions */ } } nav { background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; padding: 10px 0; width: 100%; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } nav a { color: #fff; text-align: center; padding: 14px 20px; text-decoration: none; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; border-radius: 4px; } nav a:hover { background: rgba(85, 85, 85, 0.8); transform: scale(1.1); } .hero { background: #fff; /* Set background to white */ color: #333; text-align: center; padding: 100px 20px; width: 100%; position: relative; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); border-radius: 8px; } .hero h1 { font-size: 3em; margin-bottom: 20px; animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out; } .hero p { font-size: 1.2em; margin-bottom: 30px; } .hero a { display: inline-block; background: #333; color: #fff; padding: 10px 20px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 4px; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; } .hero a:hover { background: #555; transform: scale(1.1); } .container { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 20px; padding: 20px; width: 100%; max-width: 1200px; box-sizing: border-box; animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out; } @media (min-width: 768px) { .container { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; } } @media (min-width: 1024px) { .container { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr; } } .section { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9); padding: 20px; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); border: 1px solid #ccc; animation: fadeInUp 1s ease-out; } .about-me { background: #fff; /* Set background to white */ } h2 { font-size: 2em; margin-bottom: 20px; color: #333; animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out; } p { margin-bottom: 10px; } ul { list-style-type: none; padding: 0; } li { background: #e7e7e7; margin: 5px 0; padding: 10px; border-radius: 4px; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; } li:hover { background: #d0d0d0; transform: scale(1.02); } .project { margin-bottom: 20px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .project img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 8px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .project a { display: inline-block; background: #333; color: #fff; padding: 10px 20px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 4px; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; } .project a:hover { background: #555; transform: scale(1.1); } .certificates ul, .internships ul { list-style-type: none; padding: 0; } .certificates li, .internships li { background: #e7e7e7; margin: 5px 0; padding: 10px; border-radius: 4px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; transition: transform 0.3s; } .certificates li img, .internships li img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 10px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .certificates li:hover, .internships li:hover { transform: scale(1.02); } footer { text-align: center; padding: 20px 0; background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8); color: #fff; width: 100%; } .social-icons { margin-top: 10px; } .social-icons a { margin: 0 10px; display: inline-block; transition: transform 0.3s; } .social-icons a:hover { transform: scale(1.2); } .social-icons img { width: 30px; height: 30px; object-fit: cover; } /* Animations */ @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; } to { opacity: 1; } } @keyframes fadeInUp { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } @keyframes slideInDown { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } @keyframes zoomIn { from { transform: scale(0.8); opacity: 0; } to { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } } </style> </head> <body> <header> <h1>Chandru V</h1> <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V"> <p>Portfolio</p> </header> <nav> <a href="#about-me">About</a> <a href="#skills">Skills</a> <a href="#projects">Projects</a> <a href="#certificates">Certificates</a> <a href="#internships">Internships</a> <a href="#contact">Contact</a> </nav> <section class="hero"> <h1>Chandru V - Web Developer & UI/UX Designer</h1> <p>Hi, I'm Chandru, a dedicated web developer and UI/UX designer from Coimbatore, India. I specialize in creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites. My expertise spans HTML, CSS, JavaScript, C++, Java, and React.js. I am passionate about bringing ideas to life through code and design.</p> <a href="#contact">Contact Me</a> </section> <div class="container"> <section id="about-me" class="section about-me"> <h2>About Me</h2> <p>I am Chandru, a passionate web developer and UI/UX designer based in Coimbatore, India. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I create responsive and user-friendly websites. I am also experienced in C++, Java, and React.js.</p> </section> <section id="skills" class="section skills"> <h2>Skills</h2> <ul> <li>HTML5</li> <li>CSS3</li> <li>JavaScript</li> <li>C++</li> <li>React.js</li> </ul> </section> <section id="projects" class="section projects"> <h2>Projects</h2> <div class="project"> <h3>Virtual Animal</h3> <p>A project that allows users to adopt virtual pets, providing a fun and engaging way to learn about animal care.</p> <p><a href="file:///C:/Users/Admin/OneDrive/Desktop/VIRTUAL%20ANIMAL/adoption.html" target="_blank">View Project</a></p> </div> <!-- Add more projects as needed --> </section> <section id="certificates" class="section certificates"> <h2>Certificates</h2> <ul> <li> <h3>Matlab Onramp</h3> <img src="MatLab.png" alt="Certificate 1"> </li> <li> <h3>Codsoft</h3> <img src="Codsoft.png" alt="Certificate 2"> </li> <!-- Add more certificates as needed --> </ul> </section> <section id="internships" class="section internships"> <h2>Internships</h2> <ul> <li> <h3>Krish Tec Company Internship</h3> <p>Worked on developing embedded systems applications, gaining hands-on experience with hardware-software integration, real-time operating systems, and system optimization.</p> <img src="Internship Krish tec.jpg" alt="Internship Certificate"> </li> <!-- Add more internships as needed --> </ul> </section> <section id="contact" class="section contact"> <h2>Contact</h2> <p>Email: <a href="mailto:chandruv089@gmail.com">chandruv089@gmail.com</a></p> <p>Phone: <a href="tel:+917305951073">+91-7305951073</a></p> <p>Address: Coimbatore, India</p> <div class="social-icons"> <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/chandru-venkatesan-976848258/" target="_blank"> <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/174/174857.png" alt="LinkedIn"> </a> <a href="https://github.com/your-github-username" target="_blank"> <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/733/733609.png" alt="GitHub"> </a> </div> </section> </div> <footer> <p>&copy; 2024 Chandru V. All rights reserved.</p> </footer> </body> </html> I want the top image as in circle on top right corner

To position the image in the top right corner of the header and make it circular, you need to ensure that the image is inside a wrapper with position: absolute for precise positioning. Here's how you can adjust your HTML and CSS to achieve this:

HTML

Ensure that the image is inside a div with a class for easier styling:

html
<header>
    <h1>Chandru V</h1>
    <div class="header-image">
        <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V">
    </div>
    <p>Portfolio</p>
</header>

CSS

Update your CSS to style the .header-image container and ensure that the image inside it is circular:

css
header {
    background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
    color: #fff;
    padding: 20px 0;
    text-align: center;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
    animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
}

.header-image {
    position: absolute;
    top: 20px; /* Adjust as needed */
    right: 20px; /* Adjust as needed */
    width: 100px; /* Adjust size as needed */
    height: 100px; /* Adjust size as needed */
    overflow: hidden; /* Ensures image fits within the circle */
    border-radius: 50%; /* Makes the image circular */
    border: 4px solid #fff; /* Optional: Add a border around the image */
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); /* Optional: Add a shadow */
}

.header-image img {
    width: 100%; /* Make sure the image covers the container */
    height: 100%; /* Make sure the image covers the container */
    object-fit: cover; /* Ensure the image covers the specified dimensions */
}

Explanation

  • .header-image: The container for the image is positioned absolutely at the top right of the header. It has a circular shape due to border-radius: 50% and ensures the image fits within this circular area with overflow: hidden.
  • .header-image img: The image inside the container is set to cover the full width and height of its container, maintaining its aspect ratio and ensuring it fits well within the circle.

This setup should ensure that your image is perfectly positioned in the top right corner of the header and is displayed as a circular profile image. Adjust the top and right values as needed to fine-tune its position.

want much short on that image

To make the circular image smaller, adjust the width and height of the .header-image container and ensure the image scales accordingly. Heres how you can make the image shorter:

CSS

Adjust the following CSS properties to make the image smaller:

css
header {
    background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
    color: #fff;
    padding: 20px 0;
    text-align: center;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
    animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
}

.header-image {
    position: absolute;
    top: 10px; /* Adjust as needed */
    right: 10px; /* Adjust as needed */
    width: 60px; /* Adjust size as needed */
    height: 60px; /* Adjust size as needed */
    overflow: hidden; /* Ensures image fits within the circle */
    border-radius: 50%; /* Makes the image circular */
    border: 2px solid #fff; /* Optional: Add a border around the image */
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); /* Optional: Add a shadow */
}

.header-image img {
    width: 100%; /* Make sure the image covers the container */
    height: 100%; /* Make sure the image covers the container */
    object-fit: cover; /* Ensure the image covers the specified dimensions */
}

Explanation

  • .header-image:
    • width and height are set to 60px for a smaller circular image. Adjust these values to make the image as small as desired.
    • top and right are adjusted to 10px to place the smaller image appropriately in the top-right corner. You can adjust these values to fine-tune its exact position.
    • border is reduced to 2px to match the smaller image size.

By applying these changes, your circular image should appear smaller and positioned in the top right corner of the header. Adjust the values as needed to fit your design preferences.

<!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Portfolio - Chandru V</title> <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet"> <style> /* CSS Reset */ * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; } body { font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0; padding: 0; background: url('Background Portfolio.avif') no-repeat center center fixed; background-size: cover; color: #333; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; scroll-behavior: smooth; } header { background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8); color: #fff; padding: 20px 0; text-align: center; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); width: 100%; position: relative; animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out; } .header-image { position: absolute; top: 10px; /* Adjust as needed */ right: 10px; /* Adjust as needed */ width: 60px; /* Adjust size as needed */ height: 60px; /* Adjust size as needed */ overflow: hidden; /* Ensures image fits within the circle */ border-radius: 50%; /* Makes the image circular */ border: 2px solid #fff; /* Optional: Add a border around the image */ box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); /* Optional: Add a shadow */ } .header-image img { width: 100%; /* Make sure the image covers the container */ height: 100%; /* Make sure the image covers the container */ object-fit: cover; /* Ensure the image covers the specified dimensions */ } nav { background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; padding: 10px 0; width: 100%; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } nav a { color: #fff; text-align: center; padding: 14px 20px; text-decoration: none; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; border-radius: 4px; } nav a:hover { background: rgba(85, 85, 85, 0.8); transform: scale(1.1); } .hero { background: #fff; /* Set background to white */ color: #333; text-align: center; padding: 100px 20px; width: 100%; position: relative; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); border-radius: 8px; } .hero h1 { font-size: 3em; margin-bottom: 20px; animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out; } .hero p { font-size: 1.2em; margin-bottom: 30px; } .hero a { display: inline-block; background: #333; color: #fff; padding: 10px 20px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 4px; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; } .hero a:hover { background: #555; transform: scale(1.1); } .container { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 20px; padding: 20px; width: 100%; max-width: 1200px; box-sizing: border-box; animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out; } @media (min-width: 768px) { .container { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; } } @media (min-width: 1024px) { .container { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr; } } .section { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9); padding: 20px; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); border: 1px solid #ccc; animation: fadeInUp 1s ease-out; } .about-me { background: #fff; /* Set background to white */ } h2 { font-size: 2em; margin-bottom: 20px; color: #333; animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out; } p { margin-bottom: 10px; } ul { list-style-type: none; padding: 0; } li { background: #e7e7e7; margin: 5px 0; padding: 10px; border-radius: 4px; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; } li:hover { background: #d0d0d0; transform: scale(1.02); } .project { margin-bottom: 20px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .project img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 8px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .project a { display: inline-block; background: #333; color: #fff; padding: 10px 20px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 4px; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; } .project a:hover { background: #555; transform: scale(1.1); } .certificates ul, .internships ul { list-style-type: none; padding: 0; } .certificates li, .internships li { background: #e7e7e7; margin: 5px 0; padding: 10px; border-radius: 4px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; transition: transform 0.3s; } .certificates li img, .internships li img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 10px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .certificates li:hover, .internships li:hover { transform: scale(1.02); } footer { text-align: center; padding: 20px 0; background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8); color: #fff; width: 100%; } .social-icons { margin-top: 10px; } .social-icons a { margin: 0 10px; display: inline-block; transition: transform 0.3s; } .social-icons a:hover { transform: scale(1.2); } .social-icons img { width: 30px; height: 30px; object-fit: cover; } /* Animations */ @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; } to { opacity: 1; } } @keyframes fadeInUp { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } @keyframes slideInDown { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } @keyframes zoomIn { from { transform: scale(0.8); opacity: 0; } to { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } } </style> </head> <body> <header> <h1>Chandru V</h1> <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V"> <p>Portfolio</p> </header> <nav> <a href="#about-me">About</a> <a href="#skills">Skills</a> <a href="#projects">Projects</a> <a href="#certificates">Certificates</a> <a href="#internships">Internships</a> <a href="#contact">Contact</a> </nav> <section class="hero"> <h1>Chandru V - Web Developer & UI/UX Designer</h1> <p>Hi, I'm Chandru, a dedicated web developer and UI/UX designer from Coimbatore, India.
