All rights reserved.</p> </footer> </body> </html> I want the top image as on the right corner as much shorter

To position the top image in the right corner and make it smaller, you need to make a couple of adjustments:

  1. Position the Image Properly: Use the .header-image class to position the image in the top right corner of the header.
  2. Adjust the Size: Set the size of the image to be smaller.

Here's how you can modify your HTML and CSS to achieve this:

Updated CSS

css
header {
    background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
    color: #fff;
    padding: 20px;
    text-align: center;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
    animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
}

.header-image {
    position: absolute;
    top: 10px; /* Distance from the top */
    right: 10px; /* Distance from the right edge */
    width: 40px; /* Smaller size */
    height: 40px; /* Smaller size */
    overflow: hidden; /* Ensures image fits within the circle */
    border-radius: 50%; /* Makes the image circular */
    border: 2px solid #fff; /* Optional: Add a border around the image */
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); /* Optional: Add a shadow */
}

.header-image img {
    width: 100%; /* Make sure the image covers the container */
    height: 100%; /* Make sure the image covers the container */
    object-fit: cover; /* Ensure the image covers the specified dimensions */
}

Updated HTML

You should include the header-image class in your HTML for the image that should be placed in the top right corner:

html
<header>
    <div class="header-image">
        <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V">
    </div>
    <h1>Chandru V</h1>
    <p>Portfolio</p>
</header>

Explanation

  • CSS:
    • .header-image class positions the image in the top right corner with position: absolute, and the size is set to 40px x 40px to make it smaller.
    • overflow: hidden and border-radius: 50% ensure the image remains circular.
  • HTML:
    • The image is wrapped in a div with the class header-image to apply the styling and positioning.

These changes will place the circular image in the top-right corner of the header and make it smaller. Adjust the width and height values in the CSS if you need a different size.

need bigger upto nav bar size to that photo

If you want the header image to be larger and extend up to the size of the navigation bar, you'll need to adjust the dimensions of the image and its container. You can make the image fit the height of the header while keeping it proportional and in the top-right corner.

Heres how you can modify your CSS:

Updated CSS

css
header {
    background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
    color: #fff;
    padding: 20px;
    text-align: center;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
    height: 100px; /* Adjust height to match the size of the nav bar */
    animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
}

.header-image {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%; /* Center vertically in the header */
    right: 10px; /* Distance from the right edge */
    width: 80px; /* Larger size */
    height: 80px; /* Larger size */
    overflow: hidden; /* Ensures image fits within the circle */
    border-radius: 50%; /* Makes the image circular */
    border: 2px solid #fff; /* Optional: Add a border around the image */
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); /* Optional: Add a shadow */
    transform: translateY(-50%); /* Center vertically */
}

.header-image img {
    width: 100%; /* Make sure the image covers the container */
    height: 100%; /* Make sure the image covers the container */
    object-fit: cover; /* Ensure the image covers the specified dimensions */
}

nav {
    background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8);
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    padding: 10px 0;
    width: 100%;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    height: 60px; /* Adjust height if needed */
}

Explanation

  • Header Height: Set height: 100px on the header to match the size of your navigation bar. Adjust as needed.
  • Image Size: Set the .header-image width and height to 80px to make the image larger. Adjust to fit the design you want.
  • Centering Vertically: Use top: 50% and transform: translateY(-50%) to vertically center the image in the header.

These changes will make the image larger and ensure it fits well with the height of the navigation bar. Adjust the dimensions and positioning as needed to achieve the exact look you want.

need bigger

To make the image even larger, you can further increase its size and ensure it fits well within the header space. Heres an updated approach:

Updated CSS for Larger Image

css
header {
    background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
    color: #fff;
    padding: 20px;
    text-align: center;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
    height: 120px; /* Increase height to accommodate larger image */
    animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
}

.header-image {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%; /* Center vertically in the header */
    right: 20px; /* Distance from the right edge */
    width: 100px; /* Larger size */
    height: 100px; /* Larger size */
    overflow: hidden; /* Ensures image fits within the circle */
    border-radius: 50%; /* Makes the image circular */
    border: 2px solid #fff; /* Optional: Add a border around the image */
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); /* Optional: Add a shadow */
    transform: translateY(-50%); /* Center vertically */
}

.header-image img {
    width: 100%; /* Make sure the image covers the container */
    height: 100%; /* Make sure the image covers the container */
    object-fit: cover; /* Ensure the image covers the specified dimensions */
}

nav {
    background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8);
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    padding: 10px 0;
    width: 100%;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    height: 60px; /* Adjust height if needed */
}

Changes Made

  1. Header Height: Increased the height of the header to 120px to better accommodate the larger image.
  2. Image Size: Set .header-image width and height to 100px to make the image significantly larger.
  3. Right Margin: Increased the right margin to 20px to provide more space from the edge.

These adjustments will make the image significantly larger while keeping it neatly aligned within the header section. Adjust the dimensions if needed to fit your design preferences.

need much bigger onto hero section

To place a much larger image in the hero section, you can modify the CSS to ensure the image is prominent and covers a significant portion of the hero section. Heres how you can do it:

Updated CSS for Larger Image in Hero Section

css
.hero {
    background: #fff; /* Set background to white */
    color: #333;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 100px 20px;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    border-radius: 8px;
    overflow: hidden; /* Ensure content is clipped */
}

.hero .header-image {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50px; /* Adjust position from the top */
    right: 20px; /* Distance from the right edge */
    width: 150px; /* Larger size */
    height: 150px; /* Larger size */
    overflow: hidden; /* Ensures image fits within the circle */
    border-radius: 50%; /* Makes the image circular */
    border: 2px solid #333; /* Optional: Add a border around the image */
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); /* Optional: Add a shadow */
    transform: translateY(-50%); /* Center vertically */
}

.hero .header-image img {
    width: 100%; /* Make sure the image covers the container */
    height: 100%; /* Make sure the image covers the container */
    object-fit: cover; /* Ensure the image covers the specified dimensions */
}

.hero h1 {
    font-size: 3em;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out;
}

.hero p {
    font-size: 1.2em;
    margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.hero a {
    display: inline-block;
    background: #333;
    color: #fff;
    padding: 10px 20px;
    text-decoration: none;
    border-radius: 4px;
    transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
}

.hero a:hover {
    background: #555;
    transform: scale(1.1);
}

Changes Made

  1. Hero Section Adjustments: Added overflow: hidden; to the .hero section to ensure that the image stays within the bounds and doesn't overlap with other content.
  2. Image Size: Increased the width and height of the .header-image to 150px for a larger appearance.
  3. Image Position: Adjusted the top and right properties to position the image nicely within the hero section.

Make sure you add the <div class="header-image"> inside the .hero section in your HTML:

html
<section class="hero">
    <div class="header-image">
        <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V">
    </div>
    <h1>Chandru V - Web Developer & UI/UX Designer</h1>
    <p>Hi, I'm Chandru, a dedicated web developer and UI/UX designer from Coimbatore, India. I specialize in creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites. My expertise spans HTML, CSS, JavaScript, C++, Java, and React.js. I am passionate about bringing ideas to life through code and design.</p>
    <a href="#contact">Contact Me</a>
</section>

This setup will give you a much larger image positioned prominently within the hero section. Adjust the size and position as needed to fit your design.

implement in full code

Here's your updated HTML with the larger image implemented in the hero section:

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Portfolio - Chandru V</title>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        /* CSS Reset */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        body {
            font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            background: url('Background Portfolio.avif') no-repeat center center fixed;
            background-size: cover;
            color: #333;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
        }
        header {
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            padding: 20px 0;
            text-align: center;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }

        header img {
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            border: 2px solid #fff;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
        }

        nav {
            background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8);
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: 10px 0;
            width: 100%;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }
        nav a {
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 14px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
            border-radius: 4px;
        }
        nav a:hover {
            background: rgba(85, 85, 85, 0.8);
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .hero {
            background: #fff; /* Set background to white */
            color: #333;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 100px 20px;
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            border-radius: 8px;
            overflow: hidden; /* Ensure content is clipped */
        }
        .hero .header-image {
            position: absolute;
            top: 50px; /* Adjust position from the top */
            right: 20px; /* Distance from the right edge */
            width: 150px; /* Larger size */
            height: 150px; /* Larger size */
            overflow: hidden; /* Ensures image fits within the circle */
            border-radius: 50%; /* Makes the image circular */
            border: 2px solid #333; /* Optional: Add a border around the image */
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); /* Optional: Add a shadow */
            transform: translateY(-50%); /* Center vertically */
        }
        .hero .header-image img {
            width: 100%; /* Make sure the image covers the container */
            height: 100%; /* Make sure the image covers the container */
            object-fit: cover; /* Ensure the image covers the specified dimensions */
        }
        .hero h1 {
            font-size: 3em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out;
        }
        .hero p {
            font-size: 1.2em;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        .hero a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .hero a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 20px;
            padding: 20px;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 1200px;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        @media (min-width: 1024px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        .section {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid #ccc;
            animation: fadeInUp 1s ease-out;
        }
        .about-me {
            background: #fff; /* Set background to white */
        }
        h2 {
            font-size: 2em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            color: #333;
            animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out;
        }
        p {
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        li:hover {
            background: #d0d0d0;
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        .project {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .certificates ul, .internships ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        .certificates li, .internships li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li img, .internships li img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li:hover, .internships li:hover {
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        footer {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px 0;
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            width: 100%;
        }
        .social-icons {
            margin-top: 10px;
        }
        .social-icons a {
            margin: 0 10px;
            display: inline-block;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .social-icons a:hover {
            transform: scale(1.2);
        }
        .social-icons img {
            width: 30px;
            height: 30px;
            object-fit: cover;
        }

        /* Animations */
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
        @keyframes fadeInUp {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes slideInDown {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(-20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes zoomIn {
            from {
                transform: scale(0.8);
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                transform: scale(1);
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <header>
        <h1>Chandru V</h1>
        <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V">
        <p>Portfolio</p>
    </header>
    
    <nav>
        <a href="#about-me">About</a>
        <a href="#skills">Skills</a>
        <a href="#projects">Projects</a>
        <a href="#certificates">Certificates</a>
        <a href="#internships">Internships</a>
        <a href="#contact">Contact</a>
    </nav>

    <section class="hero">
        <div class="header-image">
            <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V">
        </div>
        <h1>Chandru V - Web Developer & UI/UX Designer</h1>
        <p>Hi, I'm Chandru, a dedicated web developer and UI/UX designer from Coimbatore, India. I specialize in creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites. My expertise spans HTML, CSS, JavaScript, C++, Java, and React.js. I am passionate about bringing ideas to life through code and design.</p>
        <a href="#contact">Contact Me</a>
    </section>

    <div class="container">
        <section id="about-me" class="section about-me">
            <h2>About Me</h2>
            <p>I am Chandru, a passionate web developer and UI/UX designer based in Coimbatore, India. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I create responsive and user-friendly websites. I am also experienced in C++, Java, and React.js.</p>
        </section>

        <section id="skills" class="section skills">
            <h2>Skills</h2>
            <ul>
                <li>HTML5</li>
                <li>CSS3</li>
                <li>JavaScript</li>
                <li>C++</li>
                <li>React.js</li>
            </ul>
        </section>

        <section id="projects" class="section projects">
            <h2>Projects</h2>

            <div class="project">
                <h3>Virtual Animal</h3>
                <p>A project that allows users to adopt virtual pets, providing a fun and engaging way to learn about animal care.</p>
                <p><a href="file:///C:/Users/Admin/OneDrive/Desktop/VIRTUAL%20ANIMAL/adoption.html" target="_blank">View Project</a></p>
            </div>

            <!-- Add more projects as needed -->
        </section>

        <section id="certificates" class="section certificates">
            <h2>Certificates</h2>
            <ul>
                <li>
                    <h3>Matlab Onramp</h3>
                    <img src="MatLab.png" alt="Certificate 1">
                </li>
                <li>
                    <h3>Codsoft</h3>
                    <img src="Codsoft.png" alt="Certificate 2">
                </li>
                <!-- Add more certificates as needed -->
            </ul>
        </section>

        <section id="internships" class="section internships">
            <h2>Internships</h2>
            <ul>
                <li>
                    <h3>Krish Tec Company Internship</h3>
                    <p>Worked on developing embedded systems applications, gaining hands-on experience with hardware-software integration, real-time operating systems, and system optimization.</p>
                    <img src="Internship Krish tec.jpg" alt="Internship Certificate">
                </li>
                <!-- Add more internships as needed -->

            <p>Phone: <a href="tel:+917305951073">+91-7305951073</a></p>
            <p>Address: Coimbatore, India</p>
            <div class="social-icons">
                <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/chandru-venkatesan-976848258/" target="_blank">

                </a>

                    <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/733/733609.png" alt="GitHub">

Key Updates

  1. Hero Section: Added a .header-image div within the .hero section and increased its size to 150px x 150px. Positioned it at the top-right corner with some adjustments for better visibility.

  2. Image Styling: The image inside .header-image is set to cover the container fully and maintain its circular shape.

Feel free to adjust the image size or positioning further based on your needs!

remove the image on hero section I need only in title portfolio as little much bigger

Got it! Heres the updated HTML code with the hero section image removed and the title "Portfolio" made slightly bigger:

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Portfolio - Chandru V</title>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        /* CSS Reset */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        body {
            font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            background: url('Background Portfolio.avif') no-repeat center center fixed;
            background-size: cover;
            color: #333;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
        }
        header {
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            padding: 20px 0;
            text-align: center;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }

        header img {
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            border: 2px solid #fff;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
        }

        nav {
            background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8);
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: 10px 0;
            width: 100%;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }
        nav a {
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 14px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
            border-radius: 4px;
        }
        nav a:hover {
            background: rgba(85, 85, 85, 0.8);
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .hero {
            background: #fff; /* Set background to white */
            color: #333;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 100px 20px;
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            border-radius: 8px;
            overflow: hidden; /* Ensure content is clipped */
        }
        .hero h1 {
            font-size: 4em; /* Slightly bigger size for the title */
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out;
        }
        .hero p {
            font-size: 1.2em;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        .hero a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .hero a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 20px;
            padding: 20px;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 1200px;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        @media (min-width: 1024px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        .section {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid #ccc;
            animation: fadeInUp 1s ease-out;
        }
        .about-me {
            background: #fff; /* Set background to white */
        }
        h2 {
            font-size: 2em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            color: #333;
            animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out;
        }
        p {
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        li:hover {
            background: #d0d0d0;
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        .project {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .certificates ul, .internships ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        .certificates li, .internships li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li img, .internships li img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li:hover, .internships li:hover {
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        footer {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px 0;
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            width: 100%;
        }
        .social-icons {
            margin-top: 10px;
        }
        .social-icons a {
            margin: 0 10px;
            display: inline-block;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .social-icons a:hover {
            transform: scale(1.2);
        }
        .social-icons img {
            width: 30px;
            height: 30px;
            object-fit: cover;
        }

        /* Animations */
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
        @keyframes fadeInUp {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes slideInDown {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(-20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes zoomIn {
            from {
                transform: scale(0.8);
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                transform: scale(1);
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <header>
        <h1>Chandru V</h1>
        <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V">
        <p>Portfolio</p>

Changes Made:

fix the image on top right corner as much bigger to hero section

To position a larger image in the top right corner of the hero section while keeping the title "Portfolio" centered, you can use absolute positioning. Heres how you can update the code:

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Portfolio - Chandru V</title>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        /* CSS Reset */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        body {
            font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            background: url('Background Portfolio.avif') no-repeat center center fixed;
            background-size: cover;
            color: #333;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
        }
        header {
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            padding: 20px 0;
            text-align: center;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }

        header img {
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            border: 2px solid #fff;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
        }

        nav {
            background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8);
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: 10px 0;
            width: 100%;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }
        nav a {
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 14px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
            border-radius: 4px;
        }
        nav a:hover {
            background: rgba(85, 85, 85, 0.8);
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .hero {
            background: #fff; /* Set background to white */
            color: #333;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 100px 20px;
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            border-radius: 8px;
            overflow: hidden; /* Ensure content is clipped */
        }
        .hero h1 {
            font-size: 4em; /* Slightly bigger size for the title */
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out;
        }
        .hero p {
            font-size: 1.2em;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        .hero a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .hero a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .hero img {
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            right: 0;
            width: 40%; /* Adjust the width as needed */
            height: auto;
            object-fit: cover;
            border-radius: 0 0 0 8px; /* Rounded bottom-left corners */
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }
        .container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 20px;
            padding: 20px;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 1200px;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        @media (min-width: 1024px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        .section {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid #ccc;
            animation: fadeInUp 1s ease-out;
        }
        .about-me {
            background: #fff; /* Set background to white */
        }
        h2 {
            font-size: 2em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            color: #333;
            animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out;
        }
        p {
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        li:hover {
            background: #d0d0d0;
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        .project {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .certificates ul, .internships ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        .certificates li, .internships li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li img, .internships li img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li:hover, .internships li:hover {
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        footer {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px 0;
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            width: 100%;
        }
        .social-icons {
            margin-top: 10px;
        }
        .social-icons a {
            margin: 0 10px;
            display: inline-block;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .social-icons a:hover {
            transform: scale(1.2);
        }
        .social-icons img {
            width: 30px;
            height: 30px;
            object-fit: cover;
        }

        /* Animations */
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
        @keyframes fadeInUp {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes slideInDown {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(-20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes zoomIn {
            from {
                transform: scale(0.8);
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                transform: scale(1);
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <header>
        <h1>Chandru V</h1>
        <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V">
        <p>Portfolio</p>
    </header>
    
    <nav>
        <a href="#about-me">About Me</a>
        <a href="#skills">Skills</a>
        <a href="#projects">Projects</a>
        <a href="#certificates">Certificates</a>
        <a href="#internships">Internships</a>
        <a href="#contact">Contact</a>
    </nav>

    <section class="hero">
        <h1>Portfolio</h1>
        <p>Welcome to my portfolio website! I specialize in creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites. My expertise spans HTML, CSS, JavaScript, C++, Java, and React.js. I am passionate about bringing ideas to life through code and design.</p>
        <a href="#contact">Contact Me</a>

    </section>

    <div class="container">
        <section id="about-me" class="section about-me">

            <p>I am Chandru, a passionate web developer and UI/UX designer based in Coimbatore, India. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I create responsive and user-friendly websites. I am also experienced in C++, Java, and React.js.</p>

Updates:

  1. Hero Image: Added an image to the top right corner of the hero section with position: absolute. Adjusted its size and position.
  2. Image Size: Set the width to 40% of the hero section's width. Adjust as needed.

Feel free to modify the image URL and dimensions to fit your needs.

<!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Portfolio - Chandru V</title> <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet"> <style> /* CSS Reset */ * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; } body { font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0; padding: 0; background: url('Background Portfolio.avif') no-repeat center center fixed; background-size: cover; color: #333; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; scroll-behavior: smooth; } header { background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8); color: #fff; padding: 20px 0; text-align: center; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); width: 100%; position: relative; animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out; } header img { width: 300px; height: 300px; border-radius: 50%; object-fit: cover; position: absolute; top: 20px; right: 20px; border: 4px solid #fff; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); animation: zoomIn 2s ease-out; } nav { background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; padding: 10px 0; width: 100%; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } nav a { color: #fff; text-align: center; padding: 14px 20px; text-decoration: none; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; border-radius: 4px; } nav a:hover { background: rgba(85, 85, 85, 0.8); transform: scale(1.1); } .hero { background: #fff; /* Set background to white */ color: #333; text-align: center; padding: 100px 20px; width: 100%; position: relative; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); border-radius: 8px; } .hero h1 { font-size: 3em; margin-bottom: 20px; animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out; } .hero p { font-size: 1.2em; margin-bottom: 30px; } .hero a { display: inline-block; background: #333; color: #fff; padding: 10px 20px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 4px; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; } .hero a:hover { background: #555; transform: scale(1.1); } .container { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 20px; padding: 20px; width: 100%; max-width: 1200px; box-sizing: border-box; animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out; } @media (min-width: 768px) { .container { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; } } @media (min-width: 1024px) { .container { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr; } } .section { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9); padding: 20px; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); border: 1px solid #ccc; animation: fadeInUp 1s ease-out; } .about-me { background: #fff; /* Set background to white */ } h2 { font-size: 2em; margin-bottom: 20px; color: #333; animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out; } p { margin-bottom: 10px; } ul { list-style-type: none; padding: 0; } li { background: #e7e7e7; margin: 5px 0; padding: 10px; border-radius: 4px; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; } li:hover { background: #d0d0d0; transform: scale(1.02); } .project { margin-bottom: 20px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .project img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 8px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .project a { display: inline-block; background: #333; color: #fff; padding: 10px 20px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 4px; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; } .project a:hover { background: #555; transform: scale(1.1); } .certificates ul, .internships ul { list-style-type: none; padding: 0; } .certificates li, .internships li { background: #e7e7e7; margin: 5px 0; padding: 10px; border-radius: 4px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; transition: transform 0.3s; } .certificates li img, .internships li img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 10px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .certificates li:hover, .internships li:hover { transform: scale(1.02); } footer { text-align: center; padding: 20px 0; background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8); color: #fff; width: 100%; } .social-icons { margin-top: 10px; } .social-icons a { margin: 0 10px; display: inline-block; transition: transform 0.3s; } .social-icons a:hover { transform: scale(1.2); } .social-icons img { width: 30px; height: 30px; object-fit: cover; } /* Animations */ @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; } to { opacity: 1; } } @keyframes fadeInUp { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } @keyframes slideInDown { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } @keyframes zoomIn { from { transform: scale(0.8); opacity: 0; } to { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } } </style> </head> <body> <header> <h1>Chandru V</h1> <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V"> <p>Portfolio</p> </header> <nav> <a href="#about-me">About</a> <a href="#skills">Skills</a> <a href="#projects">Projects</a> <a href="#certificates">Certificates</a> <a href="#internships">Internships</a> <a href="#contact">Contact</a> </nav> <section class="hero"> <h1>Chandru V - Web Developer & UI/UX Designer</h1> <p>Hi, I'm Chandru, a dedicated web developer and UI/UX designer from Coimbatore, India. 2024 Chandru V. All rights reserved.</p> </footer> </body> </html> transparent the hero section

To make the hero section transparent, you need to adjust the background color and potentially the opacity of the .hero class. Heres how you can modify your CSS to achieve a transparent hero section:

css
.hero {
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7); /* Adjust opacity here */
    color: #333;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 100px 20px;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    border-radius: 8px;
}

Updates:

  • Background: Changed to rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7) which sets a white background with 70% opacity. Adjust the opacity (0.7) to your preference (e.g., 0.5 for more transparency or 0.9 for less).

Full Updated HTML and CSS:

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Portfolio - Chandru V</title>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        /* CSS Reset */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        body {
            font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            background: url('Background Portfolio.avif') no-repeat center center fixed;
            background-size: cover;
            color: #333;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
        }
        header {
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            padding: 20px 0;
            text-align: center;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        header img {
            width: 300px;
            height: 300px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            object-fit: cover;
            position: absolute;
            top: 20px;
            right: 20px;
            border: 4px solid #fff;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
            animation: zoomIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        nav {
            background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8);
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: 10px 0;
            width: 100%;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }
        nav a {
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 14px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
            border-radius: 4px;
        }
        nav a:hover {
            background: rgba(85, 85, 85, 0.8);
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .hero {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7); /* Transparent background */
            color: #333;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 100px 20px;
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            border-radius: 8px;
        }
        .hero h1 {
            font-size: 3em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out;
        }
        .hero p {
            font-size: 1.2em;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        .hero a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .hero a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 20px;
            padding: 20px;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 1200px;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        @media (min-width: 1024px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        .section {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid #ccc;
            animation: fadeInUp 1s ease-out;
        }
        .about-me {
            background: #fff; /* Set background to white */
        }
        h2 {
            font-size: 2em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            color: #333;
            animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out;
        }
        p {
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        li:hover {
            background: #d0d0d0;
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        .project {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .certificates ul, .internships ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        .certificates li, .internships li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li img, .internships li img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li:hover, .internships li:hover {
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        footer {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px 0;
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            width: 100%;
        }
        .social-icons {
            margin-top: 10px;
        }
        .social-icons a {
            margin: 0 10px;
            display: inline-block;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .social-icons a:hover {
            transform: scale(1.2);
        }
        .social-icons img {
            width: 30px;
            height: 30px;
            object-fit: cover;
        }

        /* Animations */
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
        @keyframes fadeInUp {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes slideInDown {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(-20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes zoomIn {
            from {
                transform: scale(0.8);
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                transform: scale(1);
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>

</body>
</html>

Adjust the rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7) value as needed to get the desired level of transparency for the hero section.

reduce to little bit transparency on hero section

To reduce the transparency of the hero section slightly, you can adjust the alpha value in the rgba color property. For a less transparent background, use a higher alpha value (closer to 1). For example, changing rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7) to rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8) will make the hero section less transparent.

Heres the updated CSS:

css
.hero {
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); /* Reduced transparency */
    color: #333;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 100px 20px;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    border-radius: 8px;
}

This change will make the background of the hero section more opaque while still allowing some of the background image to show through.

<!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Portfolio - Chandru V</title> <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet"> <style> /* CSS Reset */ * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; } body { font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0; padding: 0; background: url('Background Portfolio.avif') no-repeat center center fixed; background-size: cover; color: #333; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; scroll-behavior: smooth; } header { background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8); color: #fff; padding: 20px 0; text-align: center; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); width: 100%; position: relative; animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out; } header img { width: 300px; height: 300px; border-radius: 50%; object-fit: cover; position: absolute; top: 20px; right: 20px; border: 4px solid #fff; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); animation: zoomIn 2s ease-out; } nav { background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; padding: 10px 0; width: 100%; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } nav a { color: #fff; text-align: center; padding: 14px 20px; text-decoration: none; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; border-radius: 4px; } nav a:hover { background: rgba(85, 85, 85, 0.8); transform: scale(1.1); } .hero { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7); /* Transparent background */ color: #333; text-align: center; padding: 100px 20px; width: 100%; position: relative; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); border-radius: 8px; } .hero h1 { font-size: 3em; margin-bottom: 20px; animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out; } .hero p { font-size: 1.2em; margin-bottom: 30px; } .hero a { display: inline-block; background: #333; color: #fff; padding: 10px 20px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 4px; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; } .hero a:hover { background: #555; transform: scale(1.1); } .container { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 20px; padding: 20px; width: 100%; max-width: 1200px; box-sizing: border-box; animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out; } @media (min-width: 768px) { .container { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; } } @media (min-width: 1024px) { .container { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr; } } .section { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9); padding: 20px; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); border: 1px solid #ccc; animation: fadeInUp 1s ease-out; } .about-me { background: #fff; /* Set background to white */ } h2 { font-size: 2em; margin-bottom: 20px; color: #333; animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out; } p { margin-bottom: 10px; } ul { list-style-type: none; padding: 0; } li { background: #e7e7e7; margin: 5px 0; padding: 10px; border-radius: 4px; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; } li:hover { background: #d0d0d0; transform: scale(1.02); } .project { margin-bottom: 20px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .project img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 8px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .project a { display: inline-block; background: #333; color: #fff; padding: 10px 20px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 4px; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; } .project a:hover { background: #555; transform: scale(1.1); } .certificates ul, .internships ul { list-style-type: none; padding: 0; } .certificates li, .internships li { background: #e7e7e7; margin: 5px 0; padding: 10px; border-radius: 4px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; transition: transform 0.3s; } .certificates li img, .internships li img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 10px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .certificates li:hover, .internships li:hover { transform: scale(1.02); } footer { text-align: center; padding: 20px 0; background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8); color: #fff; width: 100%; } .social-icons { margin-top: 10px; } .social-icons a { margin: 0 10px; display: inline-block; transition: transform 0.3s; } .social-icons a:hover { transform: scale(1.2); } .social-icons img { width: 30px; height: 30px; object-fit: cover; } /* Animations */ @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; } to { opacity: 1; } } @keyframes fadeInUp { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } @keyframes slideInDown { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } @keyframes zoomIn { from { transform: scale(0.8); opacity: 0; } to { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } } </style> </head> <body> <header> <h1>Chandru V</h1> <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V"> <p>Portfolio</p> </header> <nav> <a href="#about-me">About</a> <a href="#skills">Skills</a> <a href="#projects">Projects</a> <a href="#certificates">Certificates</a> <a href="#internships">Internships</a> <a href="#contact">Contact</a> </nav> <section class="hero"> <h1>Chandru V - Web Developer & UI/UX Designer</h1> <p>Hi, I'm Chandru, a dedicated web developer and UI/UX designer from Coimbatore, India. I specialize in creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites. My expertise spans HTML, CSS, JavaScript, C++, Java, and React.js. I am passionate about bringing ideas to life through code and design.</p> <a href="#contact">Contact Me</a> </section> <div class="container"> <section id="about-me" class="section about-me"> <h2>About Me</h2> <p>I am Chandru, a passionate web developer and UI/UX designer based in Coimbatore, India. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I create responsive and user-friendly websites. I am also experienced in C++, Java, and React.js.</p> </section> <section id="skills" class="section skills"> <h2>Skills</h2> <ul> <li>HTML5</li> <li>CSS3</li> <li>JavaScript</li> <li>C++</li> <li>React.js</li> </ul> </section> <section id="projects" class="section projects"> <h2>Projects</h2> <div class="project"> <h3>Virtual Animal</h3> <p>A project that allows users to adopt virtual pets, providing a fun and engaging way to learn about animal care.</p> <p><a href="file:///C:/Users/Admin/OneDrive/Desktop/VIRTUAL%20ANIMAL/adoption.html" target="_blank">View Project</a></p> </div> <!-- Add more projects as needed --> </section> <section id="certificates" class="section certificates"> <h2>Certificates</h2> <ul> <li> <h3>Matlab Onramp</h3> <img src="MatLab.png" alt="Certificate 1"> </li> <li> <h3>Codsoft</h3> <img src="Codsoft.png" alt="Certificate 2"> </li> <!-- Add more certificates as needed --> </ul> </section> <section id="internships" class="section internships"> <h2>Internships</h2> <ul> <li> <h3>Krish Tec Company Internship</h3> <p>Worked on developing embedded systems applications, gaining hands-on experience with hardware-software integration, real-time operating systems, and system optimization.</p> <img src="Internship Krish tec.jpg" alt="Internship Certificate"> </li> <!-- Add more internships as needed --> </ul> </section> <section id="contact" class="section contact"> <h2>Contact</h2> <p>Email: <a href="mailto:chandruv089@gmail.com">chandruv089@gmail.com</a></p> <p>Phone: <a href="tel:+917305951073">+91-7305951073</a></p> <p>Address: Coimbatore, India</p> <div class="social-icons"> <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/chandru-venkatesan-976848258/" target="_blank"> <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/174/174857.png" alt="LinkedIn"> </a> <a href="https://github.com/your-github-username" target="_blank"> <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/733/733609.png" alt="GitHub"> </a> </div> </section> </div> <footer> <p>&copy; 2024 Chandru V. All rights reserved.</p> </footer> </body> </html> transparent the hero section as backside of the right corner photo

To make the hero section slightly transparent so it blends with the background but still stands out, especially when there is an image in the top-right corner (as in your header), you can adjust the CSS for the .hero class.

Heres a modification of your CSS to achieve this:

  1. Update the .hero section background to have less transparency.
  2. Adjust z-index to ensure the hero section is behind the header image if needed.

Heres the updated CSS:

css
.hero {
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85); /* Adjusted transparency */
    color: #333;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 100px 20px;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    border-radius: 8px;
    z-index: 1; /* Ensure it's above the background but behind the header image */
}

Ensure your header image has a higher z-index than the hero section so it appears above it:

css
header img {
    width: 300px;
    height: 300px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    object-fit: cover;
    position: absolute;
    top: 20px;
    right: 20px;
    border: 4px solid #fff;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
    animation: zoomIn 2s ease-out;
    z-index: 10; /* Ensure header image is above hero section */
}

These adjustments should help your hero section blend nicely with the background while making sure the header image remains prominent.

implement in full code

Heres the complete HTML with the updated CSS for the hero section and header image:

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Portfolio - Chandru V</title>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        /* CSS Reset */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        body {
            font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            background: url('Background Portfolio.avif') no-repeat center center fixed;
            background-size: cover;
            color: #333;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
        }
        header {
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            padding: 20px 0;
            text-align: center;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        header img {
            width: 300px;
            height: 300px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            object-fit: cover;
            position: absolute;
            top: 20px;
            right: 20px;
            border: 4px solid #fff;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
            animation: zoomIn 2s ease-out;
            z-index: 10; /* Ensure header image is above hero section */
        }
        nav {
            background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8);
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: 10px 0;
            width: 100%;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }
        nav a {
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 14px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
            border-radius: 4px;
        }
        nav a:hover {
            background: rgba(85, 85, 85, 0.8);
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .hero {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85); /* Adjusted transparency */
            color: #333;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 100px 20px;
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            border-radius: 8px;
            z-index: 1; /* Ensure it's above the background but behind the header image */
        }
        .hero h1 {
            font-size: 3em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out;
        }
        .hero p {
            font-size: 1.2em;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        .hero a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .hero a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 20px;
            padding: 20px;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 1200px;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out;
        }
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        @media (min-width: 1024px) {
            .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        .section {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid #ccc;
            animation: fadeInUp 1s ease-out;
        }
        .about-me {
            background: #fff; /* Set background to white */
        }
        h2 {
            font-size: 2em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            color: #333;
            animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out;
        }
        p {
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        li:hover {
            background: #d0d0d0;
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        .project {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #333;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        .project a:hover {
            background: #555;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        .certificates ul, .internships ul {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        .certificates li, .internships li {
            background: #e7e7e7;
            margin: 5px 0;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li img, .internships li img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .certificates li:hover, .internships li:hover {
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        footer {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px 0;
            background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8);
            color: #fff;
            width: 100%;
        }
        .social-icons {
            margin-top: 10px;
        }
        .social-icons a {
            margin: 0 10px;
            display: inline-block;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }
        .social-icons a:hover {
            transform: scale(1.2);
        }
        .social-icons img {
            width: 30px;
            height: 30px;
            object-fit: cover;
        }

        /* Animations */
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
        @keyframes fadeInUp {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes slideInDown {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(-20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        @keyframes zoomIn {
            from {
                transform: scale(0.8);
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                transform: scale(1);
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <header>
        <h1>Chandru V</h1>
        <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V">
        <p>Portfolio</p>
    </header>
    
    <nav>
        <a href="#about-me">About</a>
        <a href="#skills">Skills</a>
        <a href="#projects">Projects</a>
        <a href="#certificates">Certificates</a>
        <a href="#internships">Internships</a>
        <a href="#contact">Contact</a>
    </nav>

    <section class="hero">
        <h1>Chandru V - Web Developer & UI/UX Designer</h1>
        <p>Hi, I'm Chandru, a dedicated web developer and UI/UX designer from Coimbatore, India. I specialize in creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites. My expertise spans HTML, CSS, JavaScript, C++, Java, and React.js. I am passionate about bringing ideas to life through code and design.</p>
        <a href="#contact">Contact Me</a>
    </section>

    <div class="container">
        <section id="about-me" class="section about-me">
            <h2>About Me</h2>
            <p>I am Chandru, a passionate web developer and UI/UX designer based in Coimbatore, India. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I create responsive and user-friendly websites. I am also experienced in C++, Java, and React.js.</p>
        </section>

        <section id="skills" class="section skills">
            <h2>Skills</h2>
            <ul>
                <li>HTML5</li>
                <li>CSS3</li>
                <li>JavaScript</li>
                <li>C++</li>
                <li>React.js</li>
            </ul>
        </section>

        <section id="projects" class="section projects">
            <h2>Projects</h2>

            <div class="project">
                <h3>Virtual Animal</h3>
                <p>A project that allows users to adopt virtual pets, providing a fun and engaging way to learn about animal care.</p>
                <p><a href="file:///C:/Users/Admin/OneDrive/Desktop/VIRTUAL%20ANIMAL/adoption.html" target="_blank">View Project</a></p>
            </div>

            <!-- Add more projects as needed -->
        </section>

        <section id="certificates" class="section certificates">
            <h2>Certificates</h2>
            <ul>
                <li>
                    <h3>Matlab Onramp</h3>
                    <img src="MatLab.png" alt="Certificate 1">
                </li>
                <li>
                    <h3>Codsoft</h3>
                    <img src="Codsoft.png" alt="Certificate 2">
                </li>
                <!-- Add more certificates as needed -->
            </ul>
        </section>

        <section id="internships" class="section internships">
            <h2>Internships</h2>
            <ul>
                <li>
                    <h3>Krish Tec Company Internship</h3>
                    <p>Worked on developing embedded systems applications, gaining hands-on experience with hardware-software integration, real-time operating systems, and system optimization.</p>
                    <img src="Internship Krish tec.jpg" alt="Internship Certificate">
                </li>
                <!-- Add more internships as needed -->
            </ul>
        </section>

        <section id="contact" class="section contact">
            <h2>Contact</h2>
            <p>Email: <a href="mailto:chandruv089@gmail.com">chandruv089@gmail.com</a></p>
            <p>Phone: <a href="tel:+917305951073">+91-7305951073</a></p>
            <p>Address: Coimbatore, India</p>
            <div class="social-icons">
                <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/chandru-venkatesan-976848258/" target="_blank">
                    <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/174/174857.png" alt="LinkedIn">
                </a>
                <a href="https://github.com/your-github-username" target="_blank">
                    <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/733/733609.png" alt="GitHub">
                </a>
            </div>
        </section>
    </div>

    <footer>
        <p>&copy; 2024 Chandru V. All rights reserved.</p>
    </footer>
</body>
