Changes Made:

  • Updated .hero background to rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85) for less transparency.
  • Added z-index to .hero and header img to ensure correct layering.

This should make the hero section less transparent while keeping the header image prominent.

<!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Portfolio - Chandru V</title> <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet"> <style> /* CSS Reset */ * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; } body { font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0; padding: 0; background: url('Background Portfolio.avif') no-repeat center center fixed; background-size: cover; color: #333; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; scroll-behavior: smooth; } header { background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8); color: #fff; padding: 20px 0; text-align: center; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); width: 100%; position: relative; animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out; } header img { width: 300px; height: 300px; border-radius: 50%; object-fit: cover; position: absolute; top: 20px; right: 20px; border: 4px solid #fff; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); animation: zoomIn 2s ease-out; z-index: 10; /* Ensure header image is above hero section */ } nav { background: rgba(68, 68, 68, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; padding: 10px 0; width: 100%; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } nav a { color: #fff; text-align: center; padding: 14px 20px; text-decoration: none; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; border-radius: 4px; } nav a:hover { background: rgba(85, 85, 85, 0.8); transform: scale(1.1); } .hero { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85); /* Adjusted transparency */ color: #333; text-align: center; padding: 100px 20px; width: 100%; position: relative; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); border-radius: 8px; z-index: 1; /* Ensure it's above the background but behind the header image */ } .hero h1 { font-size: 3em; margin-bottom: 20px; animation: slideInDown 1s ease-out; } .hero p { font-size: 1.2em; margin-bottom: 30px; } .hero a { display: inline-block; background: #333; color: #fff; padding: 10px 20px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 4px; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; } .hero a:hover { background: #555; transform: scale(1.1); } .container { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 20px; padding: 20px; width: 100%; max-width: 1200px; box-sizing: border-box; animation: fadeIn 2s ease-out; } @media (min-width: 768px) { .container { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; } } @media (min-width: 1024px) { .container { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr; } } .section { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9); padding: 20px; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); border: 1px solid #ccc; animation: fadeInUp 1s ease-out; } .about-me { background: #fff; /* Set background to white */ } h2 { font-size: 2em; margin-bottom: 20px; color: #333; animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out; } p { margin-bottom: 10px; } ul { list-style-type: none; padding: 0; } li { background: #e7e7e7; margin: 5px 0; padding: 10px; border-radius: 4px; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; } li:hover { background: #d0d0d0; transform: scale(1.02); } .project { margin-bottom: 20px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .project img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 8px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .project a { display: inline-block; background: #333; color: #fff; padding: 10px 20px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 4px; transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s; } .project a:hover { background: #555; transform: scale(1.1); } .certificates ul, .internships ul { list-style-type: none; padding: 0; } .certificates li, .internships li { background: #e7e7e7; margin: 5px 0; padding: 10px; border-radius: 4px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; transition: transform 0.3s; } .certificates li img, .internships li img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 10px; transition: transform 0.3s; } .certificates li:hover, .internships li:hover { transform: scale(1.02); } footer { text-align: center; padding: 20px 0; background: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.8); color: #fff; width: 100%; } .social-icons { margin-top: 10px; } .social-icons a { margin: 0 10px; display: inline-block; transition: transform 0.3s; } .social-icons a:hover { transform: scale(1.2); } .social-icons img { width: 30px; height: 30px; object-fit: cover; } /* Animations */ @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; } to { opacity: 1; } } @keyframes fadeInUp { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } @keyframes slideInDown { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } @keyframes zoomIn { from { transform: scale(0.8); opacity: 0; } to { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } } </style> </head> <body> <header> <h1>Chandru V</h1> <img src="IMG-20240310-WA0012.jpg" alt="Chandru V"> <p>Portfolio</p> </header> <nav> <a href="#about-me">About</a> <a href="#skills">Skills</a> <a href="#projects">Projects</a> <a href="#certificates">Certificates</a> <a href="#internships">Internships</a> <a href="#contact">Contact</a> </nav> <section class="hero"> <h1>Chandru V - Web Developer & UI/UX Designer</h1> <p>Hi, I'm Chandru, a dedicated web developer and UI/UX designer from Coimbatore, India. All rights reserved.</p> </footer> </body> </html> add my instagram account

To add your Instagram account to the footer alongside LinkedIn and GitHub, you'll need to include an Instagram icon and the corresponding link in the .social-icons section. Heres how you can update the footer section of your HTML:

html
<footer>
    <p>&copy; 2024 Chandru V. All rights reserved.</p>
    <div class="social-icons">
        <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/chandru-venkatesan-976848258/" target="_blank">
            <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/174/174857.png" alt="LinkedIn">
        </a>
        <a href="https://github.com/your-github-username" target="_blank">
            <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/733/733609.png" alt="GitHub">
        </a>
        <a href="https://www.instagram.com/your-instagram-username/" target="_blank">
            <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/174/174855.png" alt="Instagram">
        </a>
    </div>
</footer>

Changes Made:

  1. Added Instagram link and icon to the .social-icons section.
  2. Updated the href attribute of the Instagram link with your actual Instagram profile URL.
  3. Used an Instagram icon from a free icon library. You can replace this with your preferred icon if needed.

Replace https://www.instagram.com/your-instagram-username/ with your actual Instagram profile URL.

ChatGPT can make mistakes. Check important info.

ChatGPT
